      <p>
       An arbitrary line
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle g}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              g
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle g}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="g" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d3556280e66fe2c0d0140df20935a6f057381d77" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.116ex; height:2.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       intersects an ellipse at
       <i>
        0, 1 or 2
       </i>
       points. In the first case the line is called
       <i>
        exterior line
       </i>
       , in the second case
       <b>
        tangent
       </b>
       and
       <i>
        secant
       </i>
       in the third case. Through any point of an ellipse there is exactly
       <i>
        one
       </i>
       tangent.
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        The tangent at a point
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                x
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 0
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 0
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="(x_{0},y_{0})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/29c296094af9a1c665425debeac5eaab99a37a04" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.421ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
        </span>
        of the ellipse
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\;}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mspace width="thickmathspace">
              </mspace>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
                <mfrac>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   x
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mfrac>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
                <mfrac>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   y
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   b
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mfrac>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mspace width="thickmathspace">
              </mspace>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\;}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\;}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/090c2f3f6d6e1f865e7ac7be8814fee8c6007b57" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:13.488ex; height:4.843ex;"/>
        </span>
        has the coordinate equation
        <ul>
         <li>
          <span class="mwe-math-element">
           <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
            <math alttext="{\displaystyle \ {\frac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}x+{\frac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}y=1\;.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
             <semantics>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
                <mtext>
                </mtext>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msub>
                   <mi>
                    x
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     0
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msub>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    a
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mi>
                 x
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msub>
                   <mi>
                    y
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     0
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msub>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    b
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mi>
                 y
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 =
                </mo>
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mspace width="thickmathspace">
                </mspace>
                <mo>
                 .
                </mo>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
               {\displaystyle \ {\frac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}x+{\frac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}y=1\;.}
              </annotation>
             </semantics>
            </math>
           </span>
           <img alt="{\displaystyle \ {\frac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}x+{\frac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}y=1\;.}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0b16a69e258300e31f03623aaed0dc1029e2f9c4" style="vertical-align: -2.171ex; width:17.709ex; height:5.176ex;"/>
          </span>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </dd>
       <dd>
        A vector equation of the tangent is
        <ul>
         <li>
          <span class="mwe-math-element">
           <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
            <math alttext="{\displaystyle \ {\vec {x}}={\begin{pmatrix}x_{0}\\y_{0}\end{pmatrix}}+s\;{\begin{pmatrix}-y_{0}a^{2}\\x_{0}b^{2}\end{pmatrix}}\quad }" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
             <semantics>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
                <mtext>
                </mtext>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mover>
                   <mi>
                    x
                   </mi>
                   <mo stretchy="false">
                    →
                    <!-- → -->
                   </mo>
                  </mover>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 =
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mrow>
                  <mo>
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mtable columnspacing="1em" rowspacing="4pt">
                   <mtr>
                    <mtd>
                     <msub>
                      <mi>
                       x
                      </mi>
                      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                       <mn>
                        0
                       </mn>
                      </mrow>
                     </msub>
                    </mtd>
                   </mtr>
                   <mtr>
                    <mtd>
                     <msub>
                      <mi>
                       y
                      </mi>
                      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                       <mn>
                        0
                       </mn>
                      </mrow>
                     </msub>
                    </mtd>
                   </mtr>
                  </mtable>
                  <mo>
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 s
                </mi>
                <mspace width="thickmathspace">
                </mspace>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mrow>
                  <mo>
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mtable columnspacing="1em" rowspacing="4pt">
                   <mtr>
                    <mtd>
                     <mo>
                      −
                      <!-- − -->
                     </mo>
                     <msub>
                      <mi>
                       y
                      </mi>
                      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                       <mn>
                        0
                       </mn>
                      </mrow>
                     </msub>
                     <msup>
                      <mi>
                       a
                      </mi>
                      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                       <mn>
                        2
                       </mn>
                      </mrow>
                     </msup>
                    </mtd>
                   </mtr>
                   <mtr>
                    <mtd>
                     <msub>
                      <mi>
                       x
                      </mi>
                      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                       <mn>
                        0
                       </mn>
                      </mrow>
                     </msub>
                     <msup>
                      <mi>
                       b
                      </mi>
                      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                       <mn>
                        2
                       </mn>
                      </mrow>
                     </msup>
                    </mtd>
                   </mtr>
                  </mtable>
                  <mo>
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
                <mspace width="1em">
                </mspace>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
               {\displaystyle \ {\vec {x}}={\begin{pmatrix}x_{0}\\y_{0}\end{pmatrix}}+s\;{\begin{pmatrix}-y_{0}a^{2}\\x_{0}b^{2}\end{pmatrix}}\quad }
              </annotation>
             </semantics>
            </math>
           </span>
           <img alt="{\displaystyle \ {\vec {x}}={\begin{pmatrix}x_{0}\\y_{0}\end{pmatrix}}+s\;{\begin{pmatrix}-y_{0}a^{2}\\x_{0}b^{2}\end{pmatrix}}\quad }" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/15ed670796e933a2efb4ddf8fe5b68ed86333e26" style="vertical-align: -2.505ex; width:28.922ex; height:6.176ex;"/>
          </span>
          with
          <span class="mwe-math-element">
           <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
            <math alttext="{\displaystyle \quad s\in \mathbb {R} \ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
             <semantics>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
                <mspace width="1em">
                </mspace>
                <mi>
                 s
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 ∈
                 <!-- ∈ -->
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mi mathvariant="double-struck">
                  R
                 </mi>
                </mrow>
                <mtext>
                </mtext>
                <mo>
                 .
                </mo>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
               {\displaystyle \quad s\in \mathbb {R} \ .}
              </annotation>
             </semantics>
            </math>
           </span>
           <img alt="{\displaystyle \quad s\in \mathbb {R} \ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/89e1a8e36e10b6f4f54dffd41271c84b307a579f" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:9.159ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
          </span>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       <b>
        Proof:
       </b>
       Let be
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(x_{0},y_{0})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/29c296094af9a1c665425debeac5eaab99a37a04" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.421ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       an ellipse point and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \;{\vec {x}}={\begin{pmatrix}x_{0}\\y_{0}\end{pmatrix}}+s\;{\begin{pmatrix}u\\v\end{pmatrix}}\;}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mover>
                <mi>
                 x
                </mi>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 →
                 <!-- → -->
                </mo>
               </mover>
              </mrow>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mtable columnspacing="1em" rowspacing="4pt">
                <mtr>
                 <mtd>
                  <msub>
                   <mi>
                    x
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     0
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msub>
                 </mtd>
                </mtr>
                <mtr>
                 <mtd>
                  <msub>
                   <mi>
                    y
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     0
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msub>
                 </mtd>
                </mtr>
               </mtable>
               <mo>
                )
               </mo>
              </mrow>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mi>
              s
             </mi>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mtable columnspacing="1em" rowspacing="4pt">
                <mtr>
                 <mtd>
                  <mi>
                   u
                  </mi>
                 </mtd>
                </mtr>
                <mtr>
                 <mtd>
                  <mi>
                   v
                  </mi>
                 </mtd>
                </mtr>
               </mtable>
               <mo>
                )
               </mo>
              </mrow>
             </mrow>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \;{\vec {x}}={\begin{pmatrix}x_{0}\\y_{0}\end{pmatrix}}+s\;{\begin{pmatrix}u\\v\end{pmatrix}}\;}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \;{\vec {x}}={\begin{pmatrix}x_{0}\\y_{0}\end{pmatrix}}+s\;{\begin{pmatrix}u\\v\end{pmatrix}}\;}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0cb8a7d65eac7b93f0084419c250be96abb81f57" style="vertical-align: -2.505ex; width:22.353ex; height:6.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       the vector equation of a line
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle g}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              g
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle g}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="g" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d3556280e66fe2c0d0140df20935a6f057381d77" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.116ex; height:2.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       (containing
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(x_{0},y_{0})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/29c296094af9a1c665425debeac5eaab99a37a04" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.421ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       ). Inserting the line's equation into the ellipse equation and respecting
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x_{0}^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y_{0}^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\;}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msubsup>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msubsup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msubsup>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msubsup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x_{0}^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y_{0}^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\;}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x_{0}^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y_{0}^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\;}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2e2c5c9be5ef78c022beb4691a98f609576b1d2d" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:13.488ex; height:5.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       yields:
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\frac {(x_{0}+su)^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {(y_{0}+sv)^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\ ,\quad \longrightarrow \quad 2s\;\left({\frac {x_{0}u}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {y_{0}v}{b^{2}}}\right)+s^{2}\;\left({\frac {u^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {v^{2}}{b^{2}}}\right)=0\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  (
                 </mo>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   x
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    0
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                 <mo>
                  +
                 </mo>
                 <mi>
                  s
                 </mi>
                 <mi>
                  u
                 </mi>
                 <msup>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  (
                 </mo>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   y
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    0
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                 <mo>
                  +
                 </mo>
                 <mi>
                  s
                 </mi>
                 <mi>
                  v
                 </mi>
                 <msup>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               ⟶
               <!-- ⟶ -->
              </mo>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <mi>
               s
              </mi>
              <mspace width="thickmathspace">
              </mspace>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <mrow>
                   <msub>
                    <mi>
                     x
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      0
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msub>
                   <mi>
                    u
                   </mi>
                  </mrow>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    a
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <mrow>
                   <msub>
                    <mi>
                     y
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      0
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msub>
                   <mi>
                    v
                   </mi>
                  </mrow>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>

                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                )
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                s
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mspace width="thickmathspace">
              </mspace>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    u
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    a
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    v
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    b
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                )
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               0
              </mn>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\frac {(x_{0}+su)^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {(y_{0}+sv)^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\ ,\quad \longrightarrow \quad 2s\;\left({\frac {x_{0}u}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {y_{0}v}{b^{2}}}\right)+s^{2}\;\left({\frac {u^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {v^{2}}{b^{2}}}\right)=0\ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle {\frac {(x_{0}+su)^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {(y_{0}+sv)^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\ ,\quad \longrightarrow \quad 2s\;\left({\frac {x_{0}u}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {y_{0}v}{b^{2}}}\right)+s^{2}\;\left({\frac {u^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {v^{2}}{b^{2}}}\right)=0\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b74dc0b85d5be6b80eef25b1bb2644de3a618fbb" style="vertical-align: -2.505ex; width:82.367ex; height:6.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       In case of
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \;(1)\;{\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}u+{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}v=0\;}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              u
             </mi>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              v
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \;(1)\;{\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}u+{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}v=0\;}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \;(1)\;{\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}u+{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}v=0\;}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d322c0fbd2263c32833032a6efbc719e381d3d7a" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:19.547ex; height:4.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       line
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle g}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              g
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle g}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="g" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d3556280e66fe2c0d0140df20935a6f057381d77" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.116ex; height:2.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       and the ellipse have only point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(x_{0},y_{0})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/29c296094af9a1c665425debeac5eaab99a37a04" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.421ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       in common and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle g}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              g
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle g}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="g" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d3556280e66fe2c0d0140df20935a6f057381d77" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.116ex; height:2.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       is a
       <i>
        tangent
       </i>
       . The tangent direction is orthogonal to vector
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle ({\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}},{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}})^{T}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                T
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle ({\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}},{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}})^{T}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle ({\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}},{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}})^{T}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f85a6178a9038e2f6fb078f05d9e7b86dbec434a" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:9.314ex; height:4.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       which is then a normal vector of the tangent and the tangent has the equation
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}x+{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}y=k\;}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mi>
              k
             </mi>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}x+{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}y=k\;}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}x+{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}y=k\;}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/959d0e8ed340ab25705a37579484e78930f9ef67" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:16.007ex; height:4.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       with a still unknown
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle k}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              k
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle k}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="k" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/c3c9a2c7b599b37105512c5d570edc034056dd40" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.211ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       . Because
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(x_{0},y_{0})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/29c296094af9a1c665425debeac5eaab99a37a04" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.421ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       is on the tangent and on the ellipse, one gets
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle k=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              k
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle k=1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="k=1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/6c035ffa69b5bca8bf2d16c3da3aaad79a8bcbfa" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.472ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       .
       <br/>
       In case of
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \;(2)\;{\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}u+{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}v\neq 0\;}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mn>
              2
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              u
             </mi>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   0
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              v
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ≠
              <!-- ≠ -->
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \;(2)\;{\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}u+{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}v\neq 0\;}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \;(2)\;{\tfrac {x_{0}}{a^{2}}}u+{\tfrac {y_{0}}{b^{2}}}v\neq 0\;}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/72e0070b8346aeb5dd32b6ddff29b0755c56aeca" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:19.547ex; height:4.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       line
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle g}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              g
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle g}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="g" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d3556280e66fe2c0d0140df20935a6f057381d77" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.116ex; height:2.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       has a second point with the ellipse in common.
      </p>
      <p>
       With help of (1) one easily checks, that
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \;(-y_{0}a^{2},x_{0}b^{2})^{T}\;}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                T
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \;(-y_{0}a^{2},x_{0}b^{2})^{T}\;}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \;(-y_{0}a^{2},x_{0}b^{2})^{T}\;}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0c05d89a662928065297095aa07233ac3f71f8f7" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:16.244ex; height:3.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       is a tangent vector at point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(x_{0},y_{0})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/29c296094af9a1c665425debeac5eaab99a37a04" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.421ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       , which proves the vector equation.
      </p>
      <p>
       <i>
        Remark:
       </i>
       If
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x_{0},y_{0})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(x_{0},y_{0})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/29c296094af9a1c665425debeac5eaab99a37a04" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.421ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (u,v)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              u
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              v
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (u,v)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(u,v)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/eadf12294edccd7a29c99cfc1765e4a14bf47e58" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:5.301ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       are two points of the ellipse, such that
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x_{0}u}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y_{0}v}{b^{2}}}=0\;}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   x
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    0
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                 <mi>
                  u
                 </mi>
                </mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   y
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    0
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                 <mi>
                  v
                 </mi>
                </mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x_{0}u}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y_{0}v}{b^{2}}}=0\;}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x_{0}u}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y_{0}v}{b^{2}}}=0\;}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d31a43ee3e0eabc5bad4ac1d0a915ed051ea9655" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:15.21ex; height:4.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       holds, then the points lie on two
       <b>
        conjugate diameters
       </b>
       of the Ellipse (see
       <a href="#Conjugate_diameters_and_the_midpoints_of_parallel_chords">
        below
       </a>
       ). In case of
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a=b}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a=b}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a=b" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/1956b03d1314c7071ac1f45ed7b1e29422dcfcc4" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.326ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       the ellipse is a circle and "conjugate" means "orthogonal".
      </p>
      <h3>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="Equation_of_a_shifted_ellipse">
        Equation of a shifted ellipse
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=6" title="Edit section: Equation of a shifted ellipse">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p>
       If the ellipse is shifted such that its center is
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (c_{1},c_{2})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               c
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               c
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (c_{1},c_{2})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(c_{1},c_{2})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/40f16dff2d0a99e639b57fd5ebf52ef4c558f3a8" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:6.965ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       the equation is
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\frac {(x-c_{1})^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {(y-c_{2})^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  (
                 </mo>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mo>
                  −
                  <!-- − -->
                 </mo>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   c
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    1
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                 <msup>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  (
                 </mo>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mo>
                  −
                  <!-- − -->
                 </mo>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   c
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                 <msup>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\frac {(x-c_{1})^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {(y-c_{2})^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle {\frac {(x-c_{1})^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {(y-c_{2})^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/c969a40e175b101b4dbc8ced1ff5e4d7356222f1" style="vertical-align: -2.171ex; width:28.016ex; height:6.176ex;"/>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       The axes are still parallel to the x- and y-axes.
      </p>
      <div class="thumb tright">
       <div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;">
        <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Elliko-sk.svg">
         <img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="247" data-file-width="260" height="209" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/75/Elliko-sk.svg/220px-Elliko-sk.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/75/Elliko-sk.svg/330px-Elliko-sk.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/75/Elliko-sk.svg/440px-Elliko-sk.svg.png 2x" width="220"/>
        </a>
        <div class="thumbcaption">
         <div class="magnify">
          <a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Elliko-sk.svg" title="Enlarge">
          </a>
         </div>
         The construction of points based on the parametric equation and the interpretation of parameter
         <i>
          t
         </i>
         , which is due to de la Hire
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <h3>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="Parametric_representation">
        Parametric representation
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=7" title="Edit section: Parametric representation">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h3>
      <div class="thumb tright">
       <div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;">
        <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Ellipse-ratpar.svg">
         <img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="272" data-file-width="479" height="125" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4e/Ellipse-ratpar.svg/220px-Ellipse-ratpar.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4e/Ellipse-ratpar.svg/330px-Ellipse-ratpar.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4e/Ellipse-ratpar.svg/440px-Ellipse-ratpar.svg.png 2x" width="220"/>
        </a>
        <div class="thumbcaption">
         <div class="magnify">
          <a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Ellipse-ratpar.svg" title="Enlarge">
          </a>
         </div>
         Ellipse points calculated by the rational representation with equal spaced parameters (
         <span class="mwe-math-element">
          <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
           <math alttext="{\displaystyle \Delta u=0.2}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
            <semantics>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
               <mi mathvariant="normal">
                Δ
                <!-- Δ -->
               </mi>
               <mi>
                u
               </mi>
               <mo>
                =
               </mo>
               <mn>
                0.2
               </mn>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
              {\displaystyle \Delta u=0.2}
             </annotation>
            </semantics>
           </math>
          </span>
          <img alt="{\displaystyle \Delta u=0.2}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/5e4af5ab76e5e90c449a38a7bdf68ed82acae499" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:9.336ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
         </span>
         )
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <p>
       <b>
        Standard parametric representation:
       </b>
       <br/>
       Using the
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Trigonometric_function" title="Trigonometric function">
        sine and cosine functions
       </a>
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \cos ,\sin }" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              cos
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              sin
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \cos ,\sin }
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \cos ,\sin }" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/bb709f682d4c55a7ce4af4cbef8aa5da94f4e72b" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:7.001ex; height:2.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       , a parametric representation of the ellipse
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f6aa55c90da259c96a7894fe6e7555d2428cdec3" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:12.198ex; height:4.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       can be obtained, :
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x,y)=(a\cos t,b\sin t),\ 0\leq t&lt;2\pi \ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mi>
               cos
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mn>
