               0
              </mn>
              <mo>
               ≤
               <!-- ≤ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               &lt;
              </mo>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle (x,y)=(a\cos t,b\sin t),\ 0\leq t&lt;2\pi \ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle (x,y)=(a\cos t,b\sin t),\ 0\leq t&lt;2\pi \ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b270c1def13e36a16e7d7d03eb2e3fee7f363762" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:36.227ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       Parameter
       <i>
        t
       </i>
       can be taken as shown in the diagram and is due to
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/De_la_Hire" title="De la Hire">
        de la Hire
       </a>
       .
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-3">
        <a href="#cite_note-3">
         [3]
        </a>
       </sup>
      </p>
      <p>
       The parameter
       <i>
        t
       </i>
       (called the
       <b>
        <a href="/wiki/Eccentric_anomaly" title="Eccentric anomaly">
         eccentric anomaly
        </a>
       </b>
       in astronomy) is
       <i>
        not
       </i>
       the angle of
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x(t),y(t))^{T}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                T
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x(t),y(t))^{T}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle (x(t),y(t))^{T}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/c7d6e35e253ec145a9734a1880ae7af9762f1385" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:12.016ex; height:3.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       with the
       <i>
        x
       </i>
       -axis (see diagram at right). For other interpretations of parameter
       <i>
        t
       </i>
       see section
       <i>
        <a href="/wiki/Ellipse#Drawing_ellipses" title="Ellipse">
         Drawing ellipses
        </a>
       </i>
       .
      </p>
      <p>
       <b>
        Rational representation:
       </b>
       <br/>
       With the substitution
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle u=\tan(t/2)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              u
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mi>
              tan
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ⁡
              <!-- ⁡ -->
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>
               /
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mn>
              2
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle u=\tan(t/2)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle u=\tan(t/2)}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/aa26eb2c6f6ff9164c263aa10e9aaf9b89c9b181" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:12.762ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and trigonometric formulae one gets
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \cos t=(1-u^{2})/(u^{2}+1)\ ,\quad \sin t=2u/(u^{2}+1)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               cos
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                u
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo>
                /
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                u
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <mi>
               u
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo>
                /
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                u
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \cos t=(1-u^{2})/(u^{2}+1)\ ,\quad \sin t=2u/(u^{2}+1)}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle \cos t=(1-u^{2})/(u^{2}+1)\ ,\quad \sin t=2u/(u^{2}+1)}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/6c183850b12e04121d3d8f8de19cd7388a5e1ab3" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:47.96ex; height:3.176ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       and the
       <i>
        rational
       </i>
       parametric equation of an ellipse
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \ {\begin{array}{lcl}x(u)&amp;=&amp;a(1-u^{2})/(u^{2}+1)\\y(u)&amp;=&amp;2bu/(u^{2}+1)\end{array}}\;,\quad -\infty &lt;u&lt;\infty \;,}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mtable columnalign="left center left" columnspacing="1em" rowspacing="4pt">
                <mtr>
                 <mtd>
                  <mi>
                   x
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mi>
                   u
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mtd>
                 <mtd>
                  <mo>
                   =
                  </mo>
                 </mtd>
                 <mtd>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mn>
                   1
                  </mn>
                  <mo>
                   −
                   <!-- − -->
                  </mo>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    u
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mo>
                    /
                   </mo>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    u
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mo>
                   +
                  </mo>
                  <mn>
                   1
                  </mn>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mtd>
                </mtr>
                <mtr>
                 <mtd>
                  <mi>
                   y
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mi>
                   u
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mtd>
                 <mtd>
                  <mo>
                   =
                  </mo>
                 </mtd>
                 <mtd>
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                  <mi>
                   b
                  </mi>
                  <mi>
                   u
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mo>
                    /
                   </mo>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    u
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mo>
                   +
                  </mo>
                  <mn>
                   1
                  </mn>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mtd>
                </mtr>
               </mtable>
              </mrow>
              <mspace width="thickmathspace">
              </mspace>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mi mathvariant="normal">
               ∞
               <!-- ∞ -->
              </mi>
              <mo>
               &lt;
              </mo>
              <mi>
               u
              </mi>
              <mo>
               &lt;
              </mo>
              <mi mathvariant="normal">
               ∞
               <!-- ∞ -->
              </mi>
              <mspace width="thickmathspace">
              </mspace>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \ {\begin{array}{lcl}x(u)&amp;=&amp;a(1-u^{2})/(u^{2}+1)\\y(u)&amp;=&amp;2bu/(u^{2}+1)\end{array}}\;,\quad -\infty &lt;u&lt;\infty \;,}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle \ {\begin{array}{lcl}x(u)&amp;=&amp;a(1-u^{2})/(u^{2}+1)\\y(u)&amp;=&amp;2bu/(u^{2}+1)\end{array}}\;,\quad -\infty &lt;u&lt;\infty \;,}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/da4e896fb5c769c7c3741dccb3549780395bb467" style="vertical-align: -2.671ex; width:50.314ex; height:6.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       which covers any point of the ellipse
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\;}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\;}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \;{\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\;}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/090c2f3f6d6e1f865e7ac7be8814fee8c6007b57" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:13.488ex; height:4.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       except the left vertex
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (-a,0)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (-a,0)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle (-a,0)}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/7234eb2b4de99774ee9d716efc6a57f255a95d91" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.044ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       .
       <br/>
       For
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle u\in [0,1],}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              u
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ∈
              <!-- ∈ -->
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              [
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              ]
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle u\in [0,1],}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle u\in [0,1],}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/a2f6453b56211367320bd29f1b315425a4cc9fed" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:9.47ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       this formula represents the right upper quarter of the ellipse moving counter-clockwise with increasing
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle u.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              u
             </mi>
             <mo>
              .
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle u.}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="u." aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/edd5636410da69bac33da075162221527401793c" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.977ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       The left vertex is the limit
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \lim _{u\to \pm \infty }(x(u),y(u))=(-a,0)\;.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <munder>
              <mo form="prefix" movablelimits="true">
               lim
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                u
               </mi>
               <mo stretchy="false">
                →
                <!-- → -->
               </mo>
               <mo>
                ±
                <!-- ± -->
               </mo>
               <mi mathvariant="normal">
                ∞
                <!-- ∞ -->
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </munder>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              u
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              u
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <mo>
              .
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \lim _{u\to \pm \infty }(x(u),y(u))=(-a,0)\;.}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \lim _{u\to \pm \infty }(x(u),y(u))=(-a,0)\;.}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b80f8db9d4df79e1d674be24cb96b6d3e2f550b1" style="vertical-align: -2.005ex; width:28.546ex; height:4.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       <br/>
       Rational representations of conic sections are popular with
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Computer_Aided_Design" title="Computer Aided Design">
        Computer Aided Design
       </a>
       (see
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Bezier_curve#Rational_Bézier_curves" title="Bezier curve">
        Bezier curve
       </a>
       ).
      </p>
      <p>
       <b>
        Tangent slope as parameter:
       </b>
       <br/>
       A parametric representation, which uses the slope
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle m}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              m
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle m}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="m" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0a07d98bb302f3856cbabc47b2b9016692e3f7bc" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:2.04ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       of the tangent at a point of the ellipse can be obtained from the derivative of the standard representation
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {x}}(t)=(a\cos t,b\sin t)^{T}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mover>
                <mi>
                 x
                </mi>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 →
                 <!-- → -->
                </mo>
               </mover>
              </mrow>
             </mrow>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mi>
              cos
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ⁡
              <!-- ⁡ -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
             <mi>
              sin
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ⁡
              <!-- ⁡ -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                T
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {x}}(t)=(a\cos t,b\sin t)^{T}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {x}}(t)=(a\cos t,b\sin t)^{T}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/587eb09014b2ecd9f5ed21c5ead6aad6e4477bd3" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:22.731ex; height:3.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       :
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {x}}'(t)=(-a\sin t,b\cos t)^{T}\quad \rightarrow \quad m=-{\frac {b}{a}}\cot t\quad \rightarrow \quad \cot t=-{\frac {ma}{b}}.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msup>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mover>
                  <mi>
                   x
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   →
                   <!-- → -->
                  </mo>
                 </mover>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                ′
               </mo>
              </msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mi>
               cos
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <msup>
               <mo stretchy="false">
                )
               </mo>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mi>
                 T
                </mi>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               →
               <!-- → -->
              </mo>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mi>
               m
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mi>
                 b
                </mi>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mi>
               cot
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               →
               <!-- → -->
              </mo>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mi>
               cot
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>
                  m
                 </mi>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                </mrow>
                <mi>
                 b
                </mi>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\vec {x}}'(t)=(-a\sin t,b\cos t)^{T}\quad \rightarrow \quad m=-{\frac {b}{a}}\cot t\quad \rightarrow \quad \cot t=-{\frac {ma}{b}}.}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {x}}'(t)=(-a\sin t,b\cos t)^{T}\quad \rightarrow \quad m=-{\frac {b}{a}}\cot t\quad \rightarrow \quad \cot t=-{\frac {ma}{b}}.}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/5a824319b5e104fb51081ce9c626c1ed132278c3" style="vertical-align: -2.005ex; width:69.455ex; height:5.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       With help of
       <a href="/wiki/List_of_trigonometric_identities#Pythagorean_identities" title="List of trigonometric identities">
        trigonometric formulae
       </a>
       one gets:
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \cos t={\frac {\cot t}{\pm {\sqrt {1+\cot ^{2}t}}}}={\frac {-ma}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}\ ,\quad \quad \sin t={\frac {1}{\pm {\sqrt {1+\cot ^{2}t}}}}={\frac {b}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               cos
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>
                  cot
                 </mi>
                 <mo>
                  ⁡
                  <!-- ⁡ -->
                 </mo>
                 <mi>
                  t
                 </mi>
                </mrow>
                <mrow>
                 <mo>
                  ±
                  <!-- ± -->
                 </mo>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <msqrt>
                   <mn>
                    1
                   </mn>
                   <mo>
                    +
                   </mo>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     cot
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <mo>
                    ⁡
                    <!-- ⁡ -->
                   </mo>
                   <mi>
                    t
                   </mi>
                  </msqrt>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mo>
                  −
                  <!-- − -->
                 </mo>
                 <mi>
                  m
                 </mi>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                </mrow>
                <mrow>
                 <mo>
                  ±
                  <!-- ± -->
                 </mo>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <msqrt>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     m
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     a
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <mo>
                    +
                   </mo>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     b
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                  </msqrt>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mspace width="1em">
              </mspace>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mrow>
                 <mo>
                  ±
                  <!-- ± -->
                 </mo>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <msqrt>
                   <mn>
                    1
                   </mn>
                   <mo>
                    +
                   </mo>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     cot
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <mo>
                    ⁡
                    <!-- ⁡ -->
                   </mo>
                   <mi>
                    t
                   </mi>
                  </msqrt>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mi>
                 b
                </mi>
                <mrow>
                 <mo>
                  ±
                  <!-- ± -->
                 </mo>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <msqrt>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     m
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     a
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <mo>
                    +
                   </mo>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     b
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                  </msqrt>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \cos t={\frac {\cot t}{\pm {\sqrt {1+\cot ^{2}t}}}}={\frac {-ma}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}\ ,\quad \quad \sin t={\frac {1}{\pm {\sqrt {1+\cot ^{2}t}}}}={\frac {b}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}.}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle \cos t={\frac {\cot t}{\pm {\sqrt {1+\cot ^{2}t}}}}={\frac {-ma}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}\ ,\quad \quad \sin t={\frac {1}{\pm {\sqrt {1+\cot ^{2}t}}}}={\frac {b}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}.}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ee220fb861e4f2af754be48014bf7d14fe43c08f" style="vertical-align: -3.171ex; width:86.901ex; height:6.676ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Replacing
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \cos t}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              cos
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ⁡
              <!-- ⁡ -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \cos t}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \cos t}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/3798aceb2c56c130331f6fc331815306df597de5" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:4.338ex; height:2.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       und
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \sin t}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              sin
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ⁡
              <!-- ⁡ -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \sin t}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="\sin t" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2b812327f691449768f64b4fe8b27c8468ec1ad8" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:4.082ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       of the standard representation one yields
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{\pm }(m)=\left(-{\frac {ma^{2}}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}\;,\;{\frac {b^{2}}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}\right)^{T},\,m\in \mathbb {R} .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msub>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mover>
                  <mi>
                   c
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   →
                   <!-- → -->
                  </mo>
                 </mover>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mo>
                 ±
                 <!-- ± -->
                </mo>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               m
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mrow>
                <mo>
                 (
                </mo>
                <mrow>
                 <mo>
                  −
                  <!-- − -->
                 </mo>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mfrac>
                   <mrow>
                    <mi>
                     m
                    </mi>
                    <msup>
                     <mi>
                      a
                     </mi>
                     <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                      <mn>
                       2
                      </mn>
                     </mrow>
                    </msup>
                   </mrow>
                   <mrow>
                    <mo>
                     ±
                     <!-- ± -->
                    </mo>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <msqrt>
                      <msup>
                       <mi>
                        m
                       </mi>
                       <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                        <mn>
                         2
                        </mn>
                       </mrow>
                      </msup>
                      <msup>
                       <mi>
                        a
                       </mi>
                       <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                        <mn>
                         2
                        </mn>
                       </mrow>

                     </msqrt>
                    </mrow>
                   </mrow>
                  </mfrac>
                 </mrow>
                 <mspace width="thickmathspace">
                 </mspace>
                 <mo>
                  ,
                 </mo>
                 <mspace width="thickmathspace">
                 </mspace>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mfrac>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     b
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>

                   <mrow>
                    <mo>

                    </mo>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <msqrt>
                      <msup>
                       <mi>

                       </mi>

                        </mn>
                       </mrow>
                      </msup>
                      <msup>
                       <mi>
                        a

                       <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

                        </mn>
                       </mrow>
                      </msup>
                      <mo>
                       +
                      </mo>
                      <msup>
                       <mi>
                        b
                       </mi>
                       <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

                        </mn>
                       </mrow>
                      </msup>
                     </msqrt>
                    </mrow>
                   </mrow>
                  </mfrac>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 )
                </mo>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mi>
                 T
                </mi>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mspace width="thinmathspace">
              </mspace>
              <mi>
               m
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ∈
               <!-- ∈ -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi mathvariant="double-struck">
                R
               </mi>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{\pm }(m)=\left(-{\frac {ma^{2}}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}\;,\;{\frac {b^{2}}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}\right)^{T},\,m\in \mathbb {R} .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{\pm }(m)=\left(-{\frac {ma^{2}}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}\;,\;{\frac {b^{2}}{\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}}}\right)^{T},\,m\in \mathbb {R} .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/06b80809e1ad01ec66a6a09fedd38a66ecbc2563" style="vertical-align: -3.171ex; width:57.99ex; height:8.009ex;"/>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       Where
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle m}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              m
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle m}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="m" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0a07d98bb302f3856cbabc47b2b9016692e3f7bc" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:2.04ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the slope of the tangent at the corresponding ellipse point,
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{+}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  c
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo>
                +
               </mo>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{+}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{+}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2b85590e6ed1728a79fdf8dae477b8f013612a4e" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:2.734ex; height:2.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the upper and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{-}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  c
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo>
                −
                <!-- − -->
               </mo>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{-}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{-}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/9c5b65dad8e65b6cd632157ffed5f6aceb0f6194" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:2.734ex; height:2.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       the lower half of the ellipse. The points with vertical tangents (vertices
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (\pm a,0)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ±
              <!-- ± -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (\pm a,0)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle (\pm a,0)}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/58f43d4d49576077a52ce7939e40b34e831b5fa5" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.044ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       ) are not covered by the representation.
       <br/>
       The equation of the tangent at point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{\pm }(m)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  c
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo>
                ±
                <!-- ± -->
               </mo>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              m
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{\pm }(m)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\vec  c}_{\pm }(m)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2a28b30737d3f9305e24285710f2ee477f51328c" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:6.584ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       has the form
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle y=mx+n}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mi>
              m
             </mi>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mi>
              n
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle y=mx+n}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle y=mx+n}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0ae774e96bc6f9f2eb75c360415fe3096dd3e8e1" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:11.859ex; height:2.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       . The still unknown
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle n}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              n
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle n}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="n" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/a601995d55609f2d9f5e233e36fbe9ea26011b3b" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.395ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       can be determined by inserting the coordinates of the corresponding ellipse point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{\pm }(m)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  c
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo>
                ±
                <!-- ± -->
               </mo>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              m
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {c}}_{\pm }(m)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\vec  c}_{\pm }(m)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2a28b30737d3f9305e24285710f2ee477f51328c" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:6.584ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       :
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle y=mx\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}\;.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mi>
               m
              </mi>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ±
               <!-- ± -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <msqrt>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  m
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </msqrt>
              </mrow>
              <mspace width="thickmathspace">
              </mspace>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle y=mx\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}\;.}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle y=mx\pm {\sqrt {m^{2}a^{2}+b^{2}}}\;.}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0fc267ead137698366aa66241d932cb832398b28" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:24.351ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       (This description of the tangents of an ellipse is an essential tool for the determination of the
       <a href="/wiki/Orthoptic_(geometry)" title="Orthoptic (geometry)">
        orthoptic
       </a>
       of an ellipse.)
      </p>
      <p>
       <b>
        Shifted Ellipse:
       </b>
       <br/>
       A
       <i>
        shifted ellipse
       </i>
       with center
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (c_{1},c_{2})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               c
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               c
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (c_{1},c_{2})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(c_{1},c_{2})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/40f16dff2d0a99e639b57fd5ebf52ef4c558f3a8" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:6.965ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       can be described by
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle (c_{1}+a\cos t\;,\;c_{2}+b\sin t),\ 0\leq t&lt;2\pi \ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mi>
               cos
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mspace width="thickmathspace">
              </mspace>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mspace width="thickmathspace">
              </mspace>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mn>
               0
              </mn>
              <mo>
               ≤
               <!-- ≤ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               &lt;
              </mo>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle (c_{1}+a\cos t\;,\;c_{2}+b\sin t),\ 0\leq t&lt;2\pi \ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle (c_{1}+a\cos t\;,\;c_{2}+b\sin t),\ 0\leq t&lt;2\pi \ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ef333dbceb14659e7e10e14fb9c7d0670408fcdd" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:38.894ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       A parametric representation of an arbitrary ellipse is contained in the section
       <i>
        <a href="/wiki/Ellipse#Ellipse_as_an_affine_image_of_the_unit_circle_x²+y²=1" title="Ellipse">
         Ellipse as an affine image of the unit circle x²+y²=1
        </a>
       </i>
       below.
      </p>
      <h3>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="Remarks_on_the_parameters_a_and_b">
        Remarks on the parameters a and b
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=8" title="Edit section: Remarks on the parameters a and b">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p>
       The parameters
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ffd2487510aa438433a2579450ab2b3d557e5edc" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.23ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle b}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle b}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="b" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f11423fbb2e967f986e36804a8ae4271734917c3" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:0.998ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       represent the lengths of line segments and are therefore non-negative real numbers. Throughout
       <i>
        this article
       </i>
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ffd2487510aa438433a2579450ab2b3d557e5edc" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.23ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the semi-major axis, i.e.,
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a\geq b\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ≥
              <!-- ≥ -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
             <mtext>
             </mtext>
             <mo>
              .
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a\geq b\ .}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle a\geq b\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/7edb14cd360d5f7e21d66304168e530fffbccebb" style="vertical-align: -0.505ex; width:6.553ex; height:2.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       In general the canonical ellipse equation
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\tfrac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f6aa55c90da259c96a7894fe6e7555d2428cdec3" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:12.198ex; height:4.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       may have
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a&lt;b}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              &lt;
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a&lt;b}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a&lt;b" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/91a7698e4c7401bb321f97888b872b583a9e4642" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.326ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       (and hence the ellipse would be taller than it is wide); in this form the semi-major axis would be
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle b}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle b}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="b" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f11423fbb2e967f986e36804a8ae4271734917c3" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:0.998ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       . This form can be converted to the form assumed in the remainder of this article simply by transposing the variable names
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle x}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle x}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="x" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/87f9e315fd7e2ba406057a97300593c4802b53e4" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.33ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle y}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle y}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="y" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b8a6208ec717213d4317e666f1ae872e00620a0d" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.155ex; height:2.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       and the parameter names
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ffd2487510aa438433a2579450ab2b3d557e5edc" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.23ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle b.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
             <mo>
              .
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle b.}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle b.}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/aef051eb30c89e5493d672f6479566c673b0890a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.644ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
      </p>
      <h2>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="Definition_of_an_ellipse_by_the_directrix_property">
        Definition of an ellipse by the directrix property
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
