        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=9" title="Edit section: Definition of an ellipse by the directrix property">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h2>
      <div class="thumb tright">
       <div class="thumbinner" style="width:302px;">
        <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Ellipse-ll-e.svg">
         <img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="225" data-file-width="296" height="228" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/93/Ellipse-ll-e.svg/300px-Ellipse-ll-e.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/93/Ellipse-ll-e.svg/450px-Ellipse-ll-e.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/93/Ellipse-ll-e.svg/600px-Ellipse-ll-e.svg.png 2x" width="300"/>
        </a>
        <div class="thumbcaption">
         <div class="magnify">
          <a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Ellipse-ll-e.svg" title="Enlarge">
          </a>
         </div>
         Ellipse: directrix property
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <p>
       The two lines at distance
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle d={\frac {a^{2}}{c}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              d
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mfrac>
               <msup>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mn>
                  2
                 </mn>
                </mrow>
               </msup>
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mfrac>
             </mrow>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle d={\frac {a^{2}}{c}}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle d={\frac {a^{2}}{c}}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ee7e7fe8a126419af0c53e5f912e009ea238a79b" style="vertical-align: -1.838ex; width:7.435ex; height:5.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       and parallel to the minor axis are called
       <b>
        directrices
       </b>
       of the ellipse (see diagram).
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        For an arbitrary point
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle P}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               P
              </mi>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle P}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="P" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b4dc73bf40314945ff376bd363916a738548d40a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.745ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
        </span>
        of the ellipse the quotient of the distance to one focus and to the corresponding directrix (see diagram) is equal to the eccentricity:
       </li>
      </ul>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <dl>
         <dd>
          <span class="mwe-math-element">
           <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
            <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\frac {|PF_{1}|}{|Pl_{1}|}}={\frac {|PF_{2}|}{|Pl_{2}|}}=e={\frac {c}{a}}\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
             <semantics>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mi>
                    P
                   </mi>
                   <msub>
                    <mi>
                     F
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      1
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msub>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                  </mrow>
                  <mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mi>
                    P
                   </mi>
                   <msub>
                    <mi>
                     l
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      1
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msub>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                  </mrow>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 =
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mi>
                    P
                   </mi>
                   <msub>
                    <mi>
                     F
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msub>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                  </mrow>
                  <mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mi>
                    P
                   </mi>
                   <msub>
                    <mi>
                     l
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msub>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                  </mrow>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 =
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 e
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 =
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <mi>
                   c
                  </mi>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mtext>
                </mtext>
                <mo>
                 .
                </mo>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
               {\displaystyle {\frac {|PF_{1}|}{|Pl_{1}|}}={\frac {|PF_{2}|}{|Pl_{2}|}}=e={\frac {c}{a}}\ .}
              </annotation>
             </semantics>
            </math>
           </span>
           <img alt="{\displaystyle {\frac {|PF_{1}|}{|Pl_{1}|}}={\frac {|PF_{2}|}{|Pl_{2}|}}=e={\frac {c}{a}}\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/20c78e9e9e83e05dac3e6a2b331804dcbe6d71f6" style="vertical-align: -2.671ex; width:26.52ex; height:6.509ex;"/>
          </span>
         </dd>
        </dl>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       The proof for the pair
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle F_{1},l_{1}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               l
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle F_{1},l_{1}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle F_{1},l_{1}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/13366c3fb9a07c61e03716c2fc53387a1d391626" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:5.33ex; height:2.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       follows from the fact that
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle |PF_{1}|^{2}=(x-c)^{2}+y^{2},\ |Pl_{1}|^{2}=(x-{\tfrac {a^{2}}{c}})^{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <msup>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo stretchy="false">
                |
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              c
             </mi>
             <msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mtext>
             </mtext>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               l
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <msup>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo stretchy="false">
                |
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mi>
                 c
                </mi>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle |PF_{1}|^{2}=(x-c)^{2}+y^{2},\ |Pl_{1}|^{2}=(x-{\tfrac {a^{2}}{c}})^{2}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle |PF_{1}|^{2}=(x-c)^{2}+y^{2},\ |Pl_{1}|^{2}=(x-{\tfrac {a^{2}}{c}})^{2}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/21555e3bbf110504e7ec38ad8e6b01407e9cceb4" style="vertical-align: -1.005ex; width:42.961ex; height:3.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle y^{2}={\tfrac {b^{2}}{a^{2}}}x^{2}-b^{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msup>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle y^{2}={\tfrac {b^{2}}{a^{2}}}x^{2}-b^{2}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle y^{2}={\tfrac {b^{2}}{a^{2}}}x^{2}-b^{2}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/edd5b185d6772e77302cba59dfa14822e6b4efa8" style="vertical-align: -1.505ex; width:15.127ex; height:4.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       satisfy the equation
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle |PF_{1}|^{2}-{\frac {c^{2}}{a^{2}}}|Pl_{1}|^{2}=0\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo stretchy="false">
                |
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mi>
               P
              </mi>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                F
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <msup>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 |
                </mo>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  c
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo stretchy="false">
                |
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mi>
               P
              </mi>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                l
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <msup>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 |
                </mo>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               0
              </mn>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle |PF_{1}|^{2}-{\frac {c^{2}}{a^{2}}}|Pl_{1}|^{2}=0\ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle |PF_{1}|^{2}-{\frac {c^{2}}{a^{2}}}|Pl_{1}|^{2}=0\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/710186e6b250fc1d9a3ca0e1a57235ab486f2617" style="vertical-align: -2.171ex; width:23.932ex; height:6.009ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       The second case is proven analogously.
      </p>
      <p>
       The
       <i>
        inverse statement
       </i>
       is also true and can be used to define an ellipse (in a manner similar to the definition of a parabola):
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        For any point
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle F}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle F}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="F" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/545fd099af8541605f7ee55f08225526be88ce57" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.741ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
        </span>
        (focus), any line
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle l}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               l
              </mi>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle l}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="l" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/829091f745070b9eb97a80244129025440a1cfac" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:0.693ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
        </span>
        (directrix) not through
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle F}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle F}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="F" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/545fd099af8541605f7ee55f08225526be88ce57" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.741ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
        </span>
        and any real number
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle e}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               e
              </mi>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle e}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="e" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/cd253103f0876afc68ebead27a5aa9867d927467" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.083ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
        </span>
        with
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle 0&lt;e&lt;1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mn>
               0
              </mn>
              <mo>
               &lt;
              </mo>
              <mi>
               e
              </mi>
              <mo>
               &lt;
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle 0&lt;e&lt;1}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle 0&lt;e&lt;1}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/679de8c4138507493a1cc5adc572bb0ffdd19a82" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:9.605ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
        </span>
        the set of points (locus of points), for which the quotient of the distances to the point and to the line is
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle e}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               e
              </mi>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle e}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="e" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/cd253103f0876afc68ebead27a5aa9867d927467" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.083ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <dl>
         <dd>
          <span class="mwe-math-element">
           <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
            <math alttext="{\displaystyle E=\{P\mid {\frac {|PF|}{|Pl|}}=e\}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
             <semantics>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
                <mi>
                 E
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 =
                </mo>
                <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">
                 {
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 P
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 ∣
                 <!-- ∣ -->
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mi>
                    P
                   </mi>
                   <mi>
                    F
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                  </mrow>
                  <mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mi>
                    P
                   </mi>
                   <mi>
                    l
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     |
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                  </mrow>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 =
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 e
                </mi>
                <mo fence="false" stretchy="false">
                 }
                </mo>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
               {\displaystyle E=\{P\mid {\frac {|PF|}{|Pl|}}=e\}}
              </annotation>
             </semantics>
            </math>
           </span>
           <img alt="{\displaystyle E=\{P\mid {\frac {|PF|}{|Pl|}}=e\}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/5cfd11891b44974f68eda0fe3527dda0fa4429e5" style="vertical-align: -2.671ex; width:20.68ex; height:6.509ex;"/>
          </span>
         </dd>
        </dl>
       </dd>
       <dd>
        is an ellipse.
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       The choice
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle e=0}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle e=0}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="e=0" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d9850169d70a5ab7df71c2126441a86cec93eec8" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.344ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       , which is the eccentricity of a circle, is in this context not allowed. One may consider the directrix of a circle to be the line at infinity.
      </p>
      <p>
       (The choice
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle e=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle e=1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="e=1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/9c2f5932668126c63c844dc00ca187bc58a29e5a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.344ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       yields a
       <a href="/wiki/Parabola" title="Parabola">
        parabola
       </a>
       and if
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle e&gt;1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mo>
              &gt;
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle e&gt;1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="e&gt;1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/9605ca17e3915b659685c0326fbbcbfb522f11b3" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.344ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       a
       <a href="/wiki/Hyperbola" title="Hyperbola">
        hyperbola
       </a>
       .)
      </p>
      <div class="thumb tright">
       <div class="thumbinner" style="width:222px;">
        <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Kegelschnitt-schar-ev.svg">
         <img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="301" data-file-width="261" height="254" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/74/Kegelschnitt-schar-ev.svg/220px-Kegelschnitt-schar-ev.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/74/Kegelschnitt-schar-ev.svg/330px-Kegelschnitt-schar-ev.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/74/Kegelschnitt-schar-ev.svg/440px-Kegelschnitt-schar-ev.svg.png 2x" width="220"/>
        </a>
        <div class="thumbcaption">
         <div class="magnify">
          <a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Kegelschnitt-schar-ev.svg" title="Enlarge">
          </a>
         </div>
         Pencil of conics with a common vertex and common semi-latus rectum
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <dl>
       <dt>
        Proof
       </dt>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Let
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle F=(f,0),\ e&gt;0}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              F
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              f
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mtext>
             </mtext>
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mo>
              &gt;
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle F=(f,0),\ e&gt;0}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle F=(f,0),\ e&gt;0}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/4f988ef1675c91f286332c94191bfd6b53674ba5" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:17.083ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and assume
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (0,0)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (0,0)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(0,0)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/5d630d3e781a53b0a3559ae7e5b45f9479a3141a" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:5.168ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       is a point on the curve. The directrix
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle l}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              l
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle l}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="l" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/829091f745070b9eb97a80244129025440a1cfac" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:0.693ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       has equation
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle x=-{\tfrac {f}{e}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <mi>
                 f
                </mi>
                <mi>
                 e
                </mi>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle x=-{\tfrac {f}{e}}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle x=-{\tfrac {f}{e}}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/5efeb568559a2dead06289ba0040decd175349e4" style="vertical-align: -1.005ex; width:7.977ex; height:3.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       . With
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle P=(x,y)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle P=(x,y)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="P=(x,y)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/099c643e67f1973c546d7e001eae4ab0ec7b2415" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:10.172ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       , the relation
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle |PF|^{2}=e^{2}|Pl|^{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
             <mi>
              F
             </mi>
             <msup>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo stretchy="false">
                |
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               e
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
             <mi>
              l
             </mi>
             <msup>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo stretchy="false">
                |
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle |PF|^{2}=e^{2}|Pl|^{2}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle |PF|^{2}=e^{2}|Pl|^{2}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/4cb3d29844176603758b959f6aabc860df7369cd" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:15.857ex; height:3.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       produces the equations
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x-f)^{2}+y^{2}=e^{2}(x+{\tfrac {f}{e}})^{2}=(ex+f)^{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               f
              </mi>
              <msup>
               <mo stretchy="false">
                )
               </mo>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                e
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
                <mfrac>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mi>
                  e
                 </mi>
                </mfrac>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <msup>
               <mo stretchy="false">
                )
               </mo>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               e
              </mi>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               f
              </mi>
              <msup>
               <mo stretchy="false">
                )
               </mo>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle (x-f)^{2}+y^{2}=e^{2}(x+{\tfrac {f}{e}})^{2}=(ex+f)^{2}}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle (x-f)^{2}+y^{2}=e^{2}(x+{\tfrac {f}{e}})^{2}=(ex+f)^{2}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2f00bb87965f8046db13bafb010aef6fb6e36bf2" style="vertical-align: -1.005ex; width:39.872ex; height:3.843ex;"/>
        </span>
        and
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle x^{2}(e^{2}-1)+2xf(1+e)-y^{2}=0.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msup>
               <mi>
                x
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                e
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mi>
               f
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               e
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               0.
              </mn>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle x^{2}(e^{2}-1)+2xf(1+e)-y^{2}=0.}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle x^{2}(e^{2}-1)+2xf(1+e)-y^{2}=0.}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d14107c5b9ceab5821afa1c8c892e63577b4d7c6" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:33.803ex; height:3.176ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       The substitution
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle p=f(1+e)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              p
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mi>
              f
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle p=f(1+e)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle p=f(1+e)}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/c20f2c9e9a54aed3dad1b35cbccf501213fb2953" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; margin-left: -0.089ex; width:12.532ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       yields
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle x^{2}(e^{2}-1)+2px-y^{2}=0.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msup>
               <mi>
                x
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                e
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <mi>
               p
              </mi>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               0.
              </mn>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle x^{2}(e^{2}-1)+2px-y^{2}=0.}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle x^{2}(e^{2}-1)+2px-y^{2}=0.}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/378818e1c274a679f04169e95946a03b7dcb50ae" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:26.799ex; height:3.176ex;"/>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       This is the equation of an
       <i>
        ellipse
       </i>
       (
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle e&lt;1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mo>
              &lt;
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle e&lt;1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="e&lt;1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2c702b141b56e60fdcb2c72832b2dcf0484607af" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.344ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       ) or a
       <i>
        parabola
       </i>
       (
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle e=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle e=1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="e=1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/9c2f5932668126c63c844dc00ca187bc58a29e5a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.344ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       ) or a
       <i>
        hyperbola
       </i>
       (
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle e&gt;1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mo>
              &gt;
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle e&gt;1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="e&gt;1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/9605ca17e3915b659685c0326fbbcbfb522f11b3" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.344ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       ). All of these non-degenerate conics have, in common, the origin as a vertex (see diagram).
      </p>
      <p>
       If
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle e&lt;1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mo>
              &lt;
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle e&lt;1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="e&lt;1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2c702b141b56e60fdcb2c72832b2dcf0484607af" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.344ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       , introduce new parameters
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a,b}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a,b}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a,b" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/181523deba732fda302fd176275a0739121d3bc8" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:3.261ex; height:2.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       so that
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle 1-e^{2}={\tfrac {b^{2}}{a^{2}}},{\text{ and }}\ p={\tfrac {b^{2}}{a}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               e
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mtext>
               and
              </mtext>
             </mrow>
             <mtext>
             </mtext>
             <mi>
              p
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
               </mfrac>
              </mstyle>
             </mrow>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle 1-e^{2}={\tfrac {b^{2}}{a^{2}}},{\text{ and }}\ p={\tfrac {b^{2}}{a}}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle 1-e^{2}={\tfrac {b^{2}}{a^{2}}},{\text{ and }}\ p={\tfrac {b^{2}}{a}}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/eb9bb742cc1c435b0e2963eb28da567f1f0865d7" style="vertical-align: -1.505ex; width:24.941ex; height:4.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       , and then the equation above becomes
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\tfrac {(x-a)^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\ ,}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
                <mfrac>
                 <mrow>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mi>
                   x
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   −
                   <!-- − -->
                  </mo>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <msup>
                   <mo stretchy="false">
                    )
                   </mo>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                 </mrow>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mfrac>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
                <mfrac>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   y
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   b
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mfrac>
               </mstyle>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\tfrac {(x-a)^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\ ,}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle {\tfrac {(x-a)^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\tfrac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1\ ,}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0db7fddefbdead73a2284a191d843b1a41321a1f" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:16.853ex; height:5.009ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       which is the equation of an ellipse with center
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (a,0)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (a,0)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(a,0)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/cb7e272c21fb886ae2ab806119c8cd35c2a52754" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:5.236ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       , the
       <i>
        x
       </i>
       -axis as major axis and the major/minor semi axis
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a,b}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a,b}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a,b" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/181523deba732fda302fd176275a0739121d3bc8" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:3.261ex; height:2.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       .
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dt>
        General case
       </dt>
      </dl>
      <p>
       If the focus is
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle F=(f_{1},f_{2})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              F
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               f
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               f
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle F=(f_{1},f_{2})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle F=(f_{1},f_{2})}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f963d2f9572de1677240963b30d1538d1e4c2977" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:12.069ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and the directrix
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle ux+vy+w=0}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              u
             </mi>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mi>
              v
             </mi>
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mi>
              w
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle ux+vy+w=0}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle ux+vy+w=0}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ecd13ff1e5b131a6015fac08aae1d2635639fe34" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:16.548ex; height:2.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       one gets the equation
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \left(x-f_{1}\right)^{2}+\left(y-f_{2}\right)^{2}=e^{2}\cdot {\frac {\left(ux+vy+w\right)^{2}}{u^{2}+v^{2}}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msup>
               <mrow>
                <mo>
                 (
                </mo>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mo>
                  −
                  <!-- − -->
                 </mo>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   f
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    1
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 )
                </mo>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mrow>
                <mo>
                 (
                </mo>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mo>
                  −
                  <!-- − -->
                 </mo>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   f
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 )
                </mo>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                e
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               ⋅
               <!-- ⋅ -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mrow>
                  <mo>
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mrow>
                   <mi>
                    u
                   </mi>
                   <mi>
                    x
                   </mi>
                   <mo>
                    +
                   </mo>
                   <mi>
                    v
                   </mi>
                   <mi>
                    y
                   </mi>
                   <mo>
                    +
                   </mo>
                   <mi>
                    w
                   </mi>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo>
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mrow>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   u
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                 <mo>
                  +
                 </mo>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   v
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \left(x-f_{1}\right)^{2}+\left(y-f_{2}\right)^{2}=e^{2}\cdot {\frac {\left(ux+vy+w\right)^{2}}{u^{2}+v^{2}}}}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle \left(x-f_{1}\right)^{2}+\left(y-f_{2}\right)^{2}=e^{2}\cdot {\frac {\left(ux+vy+w\right)^{2}}{u^{2}+v^{2}}}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/90b47deb53a6ec42ab3221227c1a649edd52c48f" style="vertical-align: -2.338ex; width:44.023ex; height:6.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       (The right side of the equation uses the
       <a href="/wiki/Hesse_normal_form" title="Hesse normal form">
        Hesse normal form
       </a>
       of a line to calculate the distance
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle |Pl|}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
             <mi>
              l
             </mi>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle |Pl|}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle |Pl|}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/3d7c36d2d45f8cae6798b5e5f711d48ec4b7c31e" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:3.732ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       .)
      </p>
      <h2>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="The_normal_bisects_the_angle_between_the_lines_to_the_foci">
        The normal bisects the angle between the lines to the foci
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=10" title="Edit section: The normal bisects the angle between the lines to the foci">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h2>
      <div class="thumb tright">
       <div class="thumbinner" style="width:252px;">
        <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Ellipse-reflex.svg">
         <img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="252" data-file-width="365" height="173" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d1/Ellipse-reflex.svg/250px-Ellipse-reflex.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d1/Ellipse-reflex.svg/375px-Ellipse-reflex.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/d1/Ellipse-reflex.svg/500px-Ellipse-reflex.svg.png 2x" width="250"/>
        </a>
        <div class="thumbcaption">
         <div class="magnify">
          <a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Ellipse-reflex.svg" title="Enlarge">
          </a>
         </div>
         Ellipse: the tangent bisects the angle between the lines to the foci
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="thumb tright">
       <div class="thumbinner" style="width:252px;">
        <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Elli-norm-tang-n.svg">
         <img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="235" data-file-width="350" height="168" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7d/Elli-norm-tang-n.svg/250px-Elli-norm-tang-n.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7d/Elli-norm-tang-n.svg/375px-Elli-norm-tang-n.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/7d/Elli-norm-tang-n.svg/500px-Elli-norm-tang-n.svg.png 2x" width="250"/>
        </a>
        <div class="thumbcaption">
         <div class="magnify">
          <a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Elli-norm-tang-n.svg" title="Enlarge">
          </a>
         </div>
         rays from one focus pass through the other focus
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <p>
       For an ellipse the following statement is true:
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        The normal at a point
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle P}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               P
              </mi>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle P}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="P" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b4dc73bf40314945ff376bd363916a738548d40a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.745ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
        </span>
        bisects the angle between the lines
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\overline {PF_{1}}},{\overline {PF_{2}}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mover>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>
                  P
                 </mi>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   F
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    1
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                </mrow>
