                <mo accent="false">
                 ¯
                 <!-- ¯ -->
                </mo>
               </mover>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mover>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>
                  P
                 </mi>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   F
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                </mrow>
                <mo accent="false">
                 ¯
                 <!-- ¯ -->
                </mo>
               </mover>
              </mrow>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\overline {PF_{1}}},{\overline {PF_{2}}}}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle {\overline {PF_{1}}},{\overline {PF_{2}}}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/6cb6dadefa4660c7179688f7d31ae18aee7b65c0" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:9.852ex; height:3.343ex;"/>
        </span>
        .
       </li>
      </ul>
      <dl>
       <dt>
        Proof
       </dt>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Because the tangent is perpendicular to the normal, the statement is true for the tangent and the complementary angle of the lines to the foci (see diagram), too.
      </p>
      <p>
       Let
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle L}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              L
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle L}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="L" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/103168b86f781fe6e9a4a87b8ea1cebe0ad4ede8" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.583ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       be the point on the line
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\overline {PF_{2}}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mover>
               <mrow>
                <mi>
                 P
                </mi>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  F
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
               </mrow>
               <mo accent="false">
                ¯
                <!-- ¯ -->
               </mo>
              </mover>
             </mrow>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\overline {PF_{2}}}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\overline {PF_{2}}}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/65b56a3496fbba215f25fe7877e73049d9e030df" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:4.409ex; height:3.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       with the distance
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle 2a}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mn>
              2
             </mn>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle 2a}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="2a" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d325c24be7d760207674a169b078892bdd5cbc76" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:2.392ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       to the focus
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle F_{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle F_{2}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="F_{2}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0fd17e0779153d765b40ebef91533489b87b2e37" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:2.549ex; height:2.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       ,
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ffd2487510aa438433a2579450ab2b3d557e5edc" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.23ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the semi major axis of the ellipse. Line
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle w}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              w
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle w}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="w" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/88b1e0c8e1be5ebe69d18a8010676fa42d7961e6" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.664ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the bisector of the angle between the lines
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\overline {PF_{1}}},{\overline {PF_{2}}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mover>
               <mrow>
                <mi>
                 P
                </mi>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  F
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   1
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
               </mrow>
               <mo accent="false">
                ¯
                <!-- ¯ -->
               </mo>
              </mover>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mover>
               <mrow>
                <mi>
                 P
                </mi>
                <msub>
                 <mi>
                  F
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msub>
               </mrow>
               <mo accent="false">
                ¯
                <!-- ¯ -->
               </mo>
              </mover>
             </mrow>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\overline {PF_{1}}},{\overline {PF_{2}}}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\overline {PF_{1}}},{\overline {PF_{2}}}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/6cb6dadefa4660c7179688f7d31ae18aee7b65c0" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:9.852ex; height:3.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       . In order to prove that
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle w}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              w
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle w}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="w" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/88b1e0c8e1be5ebe69d18a8010676fa42d7961e6" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.664ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the tangent line at point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle P}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle P}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="P" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b4dc73bf40314945ff376bd363916a738548d40a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.745ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       , one checks that any point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle Q}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              Q
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle Q}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="Q" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/8752c7023b4b3286800fe3238271bbca681219ed" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.838ex; height:2.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       on line
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle w}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              w
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle w}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="w" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/88b1e0c8e1be5ebe69d18a8010676fa42d7961e6" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.664ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       which is different from
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle P}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle P}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="P" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b4dc73bf40314945ff376bd363916a738548d40a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.745ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       cannot be on the ellipse. Hence
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle w}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              w
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle w}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="w" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/88b1e0c8e1be5ebe69d18a8010676fa42d7961e6" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.664ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       has only point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle P}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle P}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="P" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b4dc73bf40314945ff376bd363916a738548d40a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.745ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       in common with the ellipse and is, therefore, the tangent at point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle P}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              P
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle P}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="P" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b4dc73bf40314945ff376bd363916a738548d40a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.745ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       .
       <br/>
       From the diagram and the
       <a href="/wiki/Triangle_inequality" title="Triangle inequality">
        triangle inequality
       </a>
       one recognizes that
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle 2a=|LF_{2}|&lt;|QF_{2}|+|QL|=|QF_{2}|+|QF_{1}|}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mn>
              2
             </mn>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              L
             </mi>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              &lt;
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              Q
             </mi>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              Q
             </mi>
             <mi>
              L
             </mi>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              Q
             </mi>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              Q
             </mi>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle 2a=|LF_{2}|&lt;|QF_{2}|+|QL|=|QF_{2}|+|QF_{1}|}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle 2a=|LF_{2}|&lt;|QF_{2}|+|QL|=|QF_{2}|+|QF_{1}|}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/838623c65b6565c160c541a6b16e7d3542874965" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:44.551ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       holds, which means:
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle |QF_{2}|+|QF_{1}|&gt;2a}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              Q
             </mi>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mi>
              Q
             </mi>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo stretchy="false">
               |
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              &gt;
             </mo>
             <mn>
              2
             </mn>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle |QF_{2}|+|QF_{1}|&gt;2a}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle |QF_{2}|+|QF_{1}|&gt;2a}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/c84d264dcf7822bd8d1380c7e8c4583d4bddff6e" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:19.693ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       . But if
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle Q}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              Q
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle Q}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="Q" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/8752c7023b4b3286800fe3238271bbca681219ed" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.838ex; height:2.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       is a point of the ellipse, the sum should be
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle 2a}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mn>
              2
             </mn>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle 2a}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="2a" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d325c24be7d760207674a169b078892bdd5cbc76" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:2.392ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       .
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dt>
        application
       </dt>
      </dl>
      <p>
       The rays from one focus are reflected by the ellipse to the second focus. This property has optical and acoustic applications similar to the reflective property of a parabola (see
       <a href="/wiki/Whispering_gallery" title="Whispering gallery">
        whispering gallery
       </a>
       ).
      </p>
      <h2>
       <span id="Ellipse_as_an_affine_image_of_the_unit_circle_x.C2.B2.2By.C2.B2.3D1">
       </span>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="Ellipse_as_an_affine_image_of_the_unit_circle_x²+y²=1">
        Ellipse as an affine image of the unit circle x²+y²=1
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=11" title="Edit section: Ellipse as an affine image of the unit circle x²+y²=1">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h2>
      <div class="thumb tright">
       <div class="thumbinner" style="width:302px;">
        <a class="image" href="/wiki/File:Ellipse-aff.svg">
         <img alt="" class="thumbimage" data-file-height="145" data-file-width="259" height="168" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c6/Ellipse-aff.svg/300px-Ellipse-aff.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c6/Ellipse-aff.svg/450px-Ellipse-aff.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/c6/Ellipse-aff.svg/600px-Ellipse-aff.svg.png 2x" width="300"/>
        </a>
        <div class="thumbcaption">
         <div class="magnify">
          <a class="internal" href="/wiki/File:Ellipse-aff.svg" title="Enlarge">
          </a>
         </div>
         Ellipse as an affine image of the unit circle
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <p>
       Another definition of an Ellipse uses
       <a href="/wiki/Affine_transformation" title="Affine transformation">
        affine transformations
       </a>
       :
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        Any
        <i>
         Ellipse
        </i>
        is the affine image of the unit circle with equation
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle x^{2}+y^{2}=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msup>
               <mi>
                x
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle x^{2}+y^{2}=1}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="x^{2}+y^{2}=1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ec84b90236512e8d27ff1a8f7707b60b63327de1" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:11.7ex; height:3.009ex;"/>
        </span>
        .
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       An affine transformation of the Euclidean plane has the form
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {x}}\to {\vec {f}}_{0}+A{\vec {x}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mover>
                <mi>
                 x
                </mi>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 →
                 <!-- → -->
                </mo>
               </mover>
              </mrow>
             </mrow>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              →
              <!-- → -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mi>
              A
             </mi>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mover>
                <mi>
                 x
                </mi>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 →
                 <!-- → -->
                </mo>
               </mover>
              </mrow>
             </mrow>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {x}}\to {\vec {f}}_{0}+A{\vec {x}}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {x}}\to {\vec {f}}_{0}+A{\vec {x}}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/e431e5943dc2b4d638036815189e4f26ea4d2b1c" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:13.576ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       , where
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle A}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              A
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle A}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="A" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/7daff47fa58cdfd29dc333def748ff5fa4c923e3" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.743ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       is a regular
       <a href="/wiki/Matrix_(mathematics)" title="Matrix (mathematics)">
        matrix
       </a>
       (its
       <a href="/wiki/Determinant" title="Determinant">
        determinant
       </a>
       is not 0) and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d1ae526b00782f0150985cd3fa027d82369c0abd" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:2.719ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       is an arbitrary vector. If
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{1},{\vec {f}}_{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{1},{\vec {f}}_{2}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{1},{\vec {f}}_{2}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2d675df07212c5fa8c2ed45f7029276cf8ac79c7" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:6.472ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       are the column vectors of the matrix
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle A}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              A
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle A}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="A" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/7daff47fa58cdfd29dc333def748ff5fa4c923e3" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.743ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       , the unit circle
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (\cos(t),\sin(t)),t\in [0,2\pi ),}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              cos
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ⁡
              <!-- ⁡ -->
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              sin
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ⁡
              <!-- ⁡ -->
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ∈
              <!-- ∈ -->
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              [
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              2
             </mn>
             <mi>
              π
              <!-- π -->
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (\cos(t),\sin(t)),t\in [0,2\pi ),}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle (\cos(t),\sin(t)),t\in [0,2\pi ),}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/6454232cde50c035e70f7e66bf23ebe37b3f99a1" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:25.711ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       is mapped onto the Ellipse
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {x}}={\vec {p}}(t)={\vec {f}}_{0}+{\vec {f}}_{1}\cos t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\sin t\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  p
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mover>
                  <mi>
                   f
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   →
                   <!-- → -->
                  </mo>
                 </mover>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 0
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mover>
                  <mi>
                   f
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   →
                   <!-- → -->
                  </mo>
                 </mover>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mi>
               cos
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mover>
                  <mi>
                   f
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   →
                   <!-- → -->
                  </mo>
                 </mover>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\vec {x}}={\vec {p}}(t)={\vec {f}}_{0}+{\vec {f}}_{1}\cos t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\sin t\ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {x}}={\vec {p}}(t)={\vec {f}}_{0}+{\vec {f}}_{1}\cos t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\sin t\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/707c368b2f6fc583dcec78a53fa047782ab43562" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:35.76ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </li>
      </ul>
      <p>
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d1ae526b00782f0150985cd3fa027d82369c0abd" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:2.719ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the center,
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{1},\;{\vec {f}}_{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mspace width="thickmathspace">
             </mspace>
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{1},\;{\vec {f}}_{2}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{1},\;{\vec {f}}_{2}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/50eaca08529d3507b9cb4a288f2447b22d735f72" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.117ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       are the directions of two
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Conjugate_diameter" title="Conjugate diameter">
        conjugate diameters
       </a>
       of the ellipse. In general the vectors
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{1},{\vec {f}}_{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{1},{\vec {f}}_{2}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{1},{\vec {f}}_{2}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/2d675df07212c5fa8c2ed45f7029276cf8ac79c7" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:6.472ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       are not perpendicular. That means, in general
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}\pm {\vec {f}}_{1}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ±
              <!-- ± -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}\pm {\vec {f}}_{1}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}\pm {\vec {f}}_{1}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/faf9159fc255e97108c91f0d6ab67466af8110bd" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:8.278ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}\pm {\vec {f}}_{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ±
              <!-- ± -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mover>
                 <mi>
                  f
                 </mi>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  →
                  <!-- → -->
                 </mo>
                </mover>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}\pm {\vec {f}}_{2}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {f}}_{0}\pm {\vec {f}}_{2}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f98ff69c4f872c5961d91192b4bec7e2616fa760" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:8.278ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       are
       <i>
        not
       </i>
       the vertices of the ellipse.
      </p>
      <p>
       The tangent vector at point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {p}}(t)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mover>
                <mi>
                 p
                </mi>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 →
                 <!-- → -->
                </mo>
               </mover>
              </mrow>
             </mrow>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              t
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\vec {p}}(t)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {p}}(t)}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/676ccbdf4a55f2d8a1ef2608679a465cd7172733" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; margin-left: -0.089ex; width:4.063ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       is
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {p}}'(t)=-{\vec {f}}_{1}\sin t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\cos t\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msup>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mover>
                  <mi>
                   p
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   →
                   <!-- → -->
                  </mo>
                 </mover>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                ′
               </mo>
              </msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mover>
                  <mi>
                   f
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   →
                   <!-- → -->
                  </mo>
                 </mover>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mover>
                  <mi>
                   f
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   →
                   <!-- → -->
                  </mo>
                 </mover>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mi>
               cos
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\vec {p}}'(t)=-{\vec {f}}_{1}\sin t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\cos t\ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {p}}'(t)=-{\vec {f}}_{1}\sin t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\cos t\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/425465c97ff4dd792ae78b037322712a3aae5fcd" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; margin-left: -0.089ex; width:28.355ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Because at a vertex the tangent is perpendicular to the major/minor axis (diameters) of the ellipse one gets the parameter
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle t_{0}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msub>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                0
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle t_{0}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="t_{0}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/02d3006c4190b1939b04d9b9bb21006fb4e6fa4a" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.894ex; height:2.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       of a vertex from the equation
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\vec {p}}'(t)\cdot ({\vec {p}}(t)-{\vec {f}}_{0})=(-{\vec {f}}_{1}\sin t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\cos t)\cdot ({\vec {f}}_{1}\cos t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\sin t)=0}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">

              </mi>

              </mo>
              <mi>
               t
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>

                  </mi>

                   <!-- → -->
                  </mo>

                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>

               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>

              </mo>

              </mn>

            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\vec {p}}'(t)\cdot ({\vec {p}}(t)-{\vec {f}}_{0})=(-{\vec {f}}_{1}\sin t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\cos t)\cdot ({\vec {f}}_{1}\cos t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\sin t)=0}
            </annotation>

          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle {\vec {p}}'(t)\cdot ({\vec {p}}(t)-{\vec {f}}_{0})=(-{\vec {f}}_{1}\sin t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\cos t)\cdot ({\vec {f}}_{1}\cos t+{\vec {f}}_{2}\sin t)=0}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/38d2e42da8bba148ca2aca6a1cd3a3bc2d2d85f0" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; margin-left: -0.089ex; width:67.181ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       and hence
      </p>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \cot(2t_{0})={\tfrac {{\vec {f}}_{1}^{\,2}-{\vec {f}}_{2}^{\,2}}{2{\vec {f}}_{1}\cdot {\vec {f}}_{2}}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               cot
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                t
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 0
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mstyle displaystyle="false" scriptlevel="0">
                <mfrac>
                 <mrow>
                  <msubsup>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mover>
                      <mi>
                       f
                      </mi>
                      <mo stretchy="false">
                       →
                       <!-- → -->
                      </mo>
                     </mover>
                    </mrow>
                   </mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     1
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mspace width="thinmathspace">
                    </mspace>
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msubsup>
                  <mo>
                   −
                   <!-- − -->
                  </mo>
                  <msubsup>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mover>
                      <mi>
                       f
                      </mi>
                      <mo stretchy="false">
                       →
                       <!-- → -->
                      </mo>
                     </mover>
                    </mrow>
                   </mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

                 </mrow>
                 <mrow>
                  <mn>

                  </mn>
                  <msub>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mover>
                      <mi>
                       f
                      </mi>
                      <mo stretchy="false">
                       →
                       <!-- → -->
                      </mo>

                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     1
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msub>
                  <mo>
                   ⋅
                   <!-- ⋅ -->
                  </mo>
                  <msub>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

                      </mo>
