        <img alt="a" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ffd2487510aa438433a2579450ab2b3d557e5edc" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.23ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the length of the semi-major axis,
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle e}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle e}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="e" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/cd253103f0876afc68ebead27a5aa9867d927467" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.083ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the eccentricity
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\sqrt {1-b^{2}/a^{2}}},}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <msqrt>
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
               <mo>
                −
                <!-- − -->
               </mo>
               <msup>
                <mi>
                 b
                </mi>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mn>
                  2
                 </mn>
                </mrow>
               </msup>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mo>
                 /
                </mo>
               </mrow>
               <msup>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mn>
                  2
                 </mn>
                </mrow>
               </msup>
              </msqrt>
             </mrow>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle {\sqrt {1-b^{2}/a^{2}}},}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle {\sqrt {1-b^{2}/a^{2}}},}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/90afb4d39b888d2418a211ce998ac6adb221307d" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:12.472ex; height:4.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and the function
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle E}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              E
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle E}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="E" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/4232c9de2ee3eec0a9c0a19b15ab92daa6223f9b" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.776ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Complete_elliptic_integral_of_the_second_kind" title="Complete elliptic integral of the second kind">
        complete elliptic integral of the second kind
       </a>
       ,
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle E(e)=\int _{0}^{\pi /2}{\sqrt {1-e^{2}\sin ^{2}\theta }}\ d\theta ,}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               E
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               e
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <msubsup>
               <mo>
                ∫
                <!-- ∫ -->
               </mo>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 0
                </mn>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mi>
                 π
                 <!-- π -->
                </mi>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mo>
                  /
                 </mo>
                </mrow>
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msubsup>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <msqrt>
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  e
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  sin
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mo>
                 ⁡
                 <!-- ⁡ -->
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 θ
                 <!-- θ -->
                </mi>
               </msqrt>
              </mrow>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mi>
               d
              </mi>
              <mi>
               θ
               <!-- θ -->
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle E(e)=\int _{0}^{\pi /2}{\sqrt {1-e^{2}\sin ^{2}\theta }}\ d\theta ,}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle E(e)=\int _{0}^{\pi /2}{\sqrt {1-e^{2}\sin ^{2}\theta }}\ d\theta ,}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d4e2d3ae9b2a30bccf05497794630e2596d432e9" style="vertical-align: -2.338ex; width:31.209ex; height:6.343ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       which calculates the circumference of the ellipse in the first quadrant alone, and the formula for the circumference of an ellipse can thus be written
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <table style="border-collapse:collapse; background:none; margin:0; border:none;">
         <tr>
          <td class="nowrap" style="vertical-align:middle; border:none; padding:0.08em;">
           <p style="margin:0;">
            <span class="mwe-math-element">
             <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
              <math alttext="{\displaystyle C=4a\int _{0}^{\pi /2}{\sqrt {1-e^{2}\sin ^{2}\theta }}\ d\theta .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
               <semantics>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
                  <mi>
                   C
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   =
                  </mo>
                  <mn>
                   4
                  </mn>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <msubsup>
                   <mo>
                    ∫
                    <!-- ∫ -->
                   </mo>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     0
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mi>
                     π
                     <!-- π -->
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mo>
                      /
                     </mo>
                    </mrow>
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msubsup>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <msqrt>
                    <mn>
                     1
                    </mn>
                    <mo>
                     −
                     <!-- − -->
                    </mo>
                    <msup>
                     <mi>
                      e
                     </mi>
                     <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                      <mn>
                       2
                      </mn>
                     </mrow>
                    </msup>
                    <msup>
                     <mi>
                      sin
                     </mi>
                     <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                      <mn>
                       2
                      </mn>
                     </mrow>
                    </msup>
                    <mo>
                     ⁡
                     <!-- ⁡ -->
                    </mo>
                    <mi>
                     θ
                     <!-- θ -->
                    </mi>
                   </msqrt>
                  </mrow>
                  <mtext>
                  </mtext>
                  <mi>
                   d
                  </mi>
                  <mi>
                   θ
                   <!-- θ -->
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   .
                  </mo>
                 </mstyle>
                </mrow>
                <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
                 {\displaystyle C=4a\int _{0}^{\pi /2}{\sqrt {1-e^{2}\sin ^{2}\theta }}\ d\theta .}
                </annotation>
               </semantics>
              </math>
             </span>
             <img alt="{\displaystyle C=4a\int _{0}^{\pi /2}{\sqrt {1-e^{2}\sin ^{2}\theta }}\ d\theta .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b88d0981f5ad34c9434ae49dffb70150c9723e38" style="vertical-align: -2.338ex; width:31.086ex; height:6.343ex;"/>
            </span>
           </p>
          </td>
          <td style="vertical-align:middle; width:99%; border:none; padding:0.08em;">
           <p style="margin:0;">
           </p>
           <table style="border-collapse:collapse; background:none; margin:0; border:none; width:99%;">
            <tr>
             <td rowspan="2" style="border:none; padding:0.08em;">
              <p style="margin:0; font-size:4pt;">
              </p>
             </td>
             <td style="width:100%; border:none; padding:0.08em;">
              <p style="margin:0; font-size:1pt;">
              </p>
             </td>
             <td rowspan="2" style="border:none; padding:0.08em;">
              <p style="margin:0; font-size:4pt;">
              </p>
             </td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
             <td style="border-left:none; border-top:0px none #e5e5e5; border-right:none; border-bottom:none; padding:0.08em;">
              <p style="margin:0; font-size:1pt;">
              </p>
             </td>
            </tr>
           </table>
          </td>
          <td class="nowrap" style="vertical-align:middle; border:none; padding:0.08em;">
           <p style="margin:0pt;">
            <b>
             (
             <span class="reference nourlexpansion" id="math_3" style="font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">
              3
             </span>
             )
            </b>
           </p>
          </td>
         </tr>
        </table>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       The arc length of an ellipse, in general, has no closed-form solution in terms of elementary functions.
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Elliptic_integrals" title="Elliptic integrals">
        Elliptic integrals
       </a>
       were motivated by this problem. Equation (
       <b>
        <a href="#math_3">
         3
        </a>
       </b>
       ) may be evaluated directly using the
       <a href="/wiki/Carlson_symmetric_form" title="Carlson symmetric form">
        Carlson symmetric form
       </a>
       .
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-7">
        <a href="#cite_note-7">
         [7]
        </a>
       </sup>
       This gives a succinct and quadratically converging iterative method for evaluating the circumference using the
       <a href="/wiki/Arithmetic%E2%80%93geometric_mean" title="Arithmetic–geometric mean">
        arithmetic-geometric mean.
       </a>
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-8">
        <a href="#cite_note-8">
         [8]
        </a>
       </sup>
      </p>
      <p>
       The exact
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Infinite_series" title="Infinite series">
        infinite series
       </a>
       is:
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle C=2\pi a\left[{1-\left({\frac {1}{2}}\right)^{2}e^{2}-\left({\frac {1\cdot 3}{2\cdot 4}}\right)^{2}{\frac {e^{4}}{3}}-\left({\frac {1\cdot 3\cdot 5}{2\cdot 4\cdot 6}}\right)^{2}{\frac {e^{6}}{5}}-\cdots }\right]}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               C
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                [
               </mo>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mrow>
                  <mo>
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mfrac>
                    <mn>
                     1
                    </mn>
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mfrac>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo>
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  e
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mrow>
                  <mo>
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mfrac>
                    <mrow>
                     <mn>
                      1
                     </mn>
                     <mo>
                      ⋅
                      <!-- ⋅ -->
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      3
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                    <mrow>
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                     <mo>
                      ⋅
                      <!-- ⋅ -->
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      4
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </mfrac>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo>
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    e
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     4
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mn>
                   3
                  </mn>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mrow>
                  <mo>
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mfrac>
                    <mrow>
                     <mn>
                      1
                     </mn>
                     <mo>
                      ⋅
                      <!-- ⋅ -->
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      3
                     </mn>
                     <mo>
                      ⋅
                      <!-- ⋅ -->
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      5
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                    <mrow>
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                     <mo>
                      ⋅
                      <!-- ⋅ -->
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      4
                     </mn>
                     <mo>
                      ⋅
                      <!-- ⋅ -->
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      6
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </mfrac>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo>
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    e
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     6
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mn>
                   5
                  </mn>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <mo>
                 ⋯
                 <!-- ⋯ -->
                </mo>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                ]
               </mo>
              </mrow>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle C=2\pi a\left[{1-\left({\frac {1}{2}}\right)^{2}e^{2}-\left({\frac {1\cdot 3}{2\cdot 4}}\right)^{2}{\frac {e^{4}}{3}}-\left({\frac {1\cdot 3\cdot 5}{2\cdot 4\cdot 6}}\right)^{2}{\frac {e^{6}}{5}}-\cdots }\right]}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle C=2\pi a\left[{1-\left({\frac {1}{2}}\right)^{2}e^{2}-\left({\frac {1\cdot 3}{2\cdot 4}}\right)^{2}{\frac {e^{4}}{3}}-\left({\frac {1\cdot 3\cdot 5}{2\cdot 4\cdot 6}}\right)^{2}{\frac {e^{6}}{5}}-\cdots }\right]}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/e501b8ef0a491a04ec372b008ed41e0298acfa41" style="vertical-align: -3.171ex; width:62.966ex; height:7.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle =2\pi a\left[1-\sum _{n=1}^{\infty }\left({\frac {(2n-1)!!}{(2n)!!}}\right)^{2}{\frac {e^{2n}}{2n-1}}\right],}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                [
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <munderover>
                 <mo>
                  ∑
                  <!-- ∑ -->
                 </mo>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mi>
                   n
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   =
                  </mo>
                  <mn>
                   1
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mi mathvariant="normal">
                   ∞
                   <!-- ∞ -->
                  </mi>
                 </mrow>
                </munderover>
                <msup>
                 <mrow>
                  <mo>
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mfrac>
                    <mrow>
                     <mo stretchy="false">
                      (
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                     <mi>
                      n
                     </mi>
                     <mo>
                      −
                      <!-- − -->
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      1
                     </mn>
                     <mo stretchy="false">
                      )
                     </mo>
                     <mo>
                      !
                     </mo>
                     <mo>
                      !
                     </mo>
                    </mrow>
                    <mrow>
                     <mo stretchy="false">
                      (
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                     <mi>
                      n
                     </mi>
                     <mo stretchy="false">
                      )
                     </mo>
                     <mo>
                      !
                     </mo>
                     <mo>
                      !
                     </mo>
                    </mrow>
                   </mfrac>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo>
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    e
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                    <mi>
                     n
                    </mi>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mrow>
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                   <mi>
                    n
                   </mi>
                   <mo>
                    −
                    <!-- − -->
                   </mo>
                   <mn>
                    1
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                ]
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle =2\pi a\left[1-\sum _{n=1}^{\infty }\left({\frac {(2n-1)!!}{(2n)!!}}\right)^{2}{\frac {e^{2n}}{2n-1}}\right],}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle =2\pi a\left[1-\sum _{n=1}^{\infty }\left({\frac {(2n-1)!!}{(2n)!!}}\right)^{2}{\frac {e^{2n}}{2n-1}}\right],}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d2b0f06eb6428d757cfd44979342db46bad93448" style="vertical-align: -3.171ex; width:40.425ex; height:7.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       where
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle n!!}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              n
             </mi>
             <mo>
              !
             </mo>
             <mo>
              !
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle n!!}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="n!!" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/511717d541dba5357928e8d8631f1b4d4f8d5b31" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:2.688ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the
       <a href="/wiki/Double_factorial" title="Double factorial">
        double factorial
       </a>
       . Unfortunately, this series converges rather slowly; however, by expanding in terms of
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle h=(a-b)^{2}/(a+b)^{2},}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              h
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
             <msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>
               /
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
             <msup>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle h=(a-b)^{2}/(a+b)^{2},}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle h=(a-b)^{2}/(a+b)^{2},}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/16a34465dd9ec33947b0be74eb173ebb86dc21ca" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:22.109ex; height:3.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       Ivory
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-9">
        <a href="#cite_note-9">
         [9]
        </a>
       </sup>
       and Bessel
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-10">
        <a href="#cite_note-10">
         [10]
        </a>
       </sup>
       derived an expression that converges much more rapidly,
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle C=\pi (a+b)\left[1+\sum _{n=1}^{\infty }\left({\frac {(2n-1)!!}{2^{n}n!}}\right)^{2}{\frac {h^{n}}{(2n-1)^{2}}}\right].}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               C
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                [
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <munderover>
                 <mo>
                  ∑
                  <!-- ∑ -->
                 </mo>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mi>
                   n
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   =
                  </mo>
                  <mn>
                   1
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mi mathvariant="normal">
                   ∞
                   <!-- ∞ -->
                  </mi>
                 </mrow>
                </munderover>
                <msup>
                 <mrow>
                  <mo>
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mfrac>
                    <mrow>
                     <mo stretchy="false">
                      (
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                     <mi>
                      n
                     </mi>
                     <mo>
                      −
                      <!-- − -->
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      1
                     </mn>
                     <mo stretchy="false">
                      )
                     </mo>
                     <mo>
                      !
                     </mo>
                     <mo>
                      !
                     </mo>
                    </mrow>
                    <mrow>
                     <msup>
                      <mn>
                       2
                      </mn>
                      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                       <mi>
                        n
                       </mi>
                      </mrow>
                     </msup>
                     <mi>
                      n
                     </mi>
                     <mo>
                      !
                     </mo>
                    </mrow>
                   </mfrac>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo>
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    h
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mi>
                     n
                    </mi>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mrow>
                   <mo stretchy="false">
                    (
                   </mo>
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                   <mi>
                    n
                   </mi>
                   <mo>
                    −
                    <!-- − -->
                   </mo>
                   <mn>
                    1
                   </mn>
                   <msup>
                    <mo stretchy="false">
                     )
                    </mo>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                  </mrow>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                ]
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle C=\pi (a+b)\left[1+\sum _{n=1}^{\infty }\left({\frac {(2n-1)!!}{2^{n}n!}}\right)^{2}{\frac {h^{n}}{(2n-1)^{2}}}\right].}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle C=\pi (a+b)\left[1+\sum _{n=1}^{\infty }\left({\frac {(2n-1)!!}{2^{n}n!}}\right)^{2}{\frac {h^{n}}{(2n-1)^{2}}}\right].}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/bbdc893aa9afd300340de4f2a6ed6b39a3ac81d3" style="vertical-align: -3.171ex; width:50.185ex; height:7.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       <a href="/wiki/Srinivasa_Ramanujan" title="Srinivasa Ramanujan">
        Ramanujan
       </a>
       gives two good
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Approximations" title="Approximations">
        approximations
       </a>
       for the circumference in §16 of "Modular Equations and Approximations to
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \pi }" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              π
              <!-- π -->
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \pi }
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="\pi " aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/9be4ba0bb8df3af72e90a0535fabcc17431e540a" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.332ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       ";
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-11">
        <a href="#cite_note-11">
         [11]
        </a>
       </sup>
       they are
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle C\approx \pi \left[3(a+b)-{\sqrt {(3a+b)(a+3b)}}\right]=\pi \left[3(a+b)-{\sqrt {10ab+3(a^{2}+b^{2})}}\right]}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               C
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ≈
               <!-- ≈ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                [
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mn>
                 3
                </mn>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 (
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 b
                </mi>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 )
                </mo>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <msqrt>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mn>
                   3
                  </mn>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   +
                  </mo>
                  <mi>
                   b
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   +
                  </mo>
                  <mn>
                   3
                  </mn>
                  <mi>
                   b
                  </mi>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </msqrt>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                ]
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                [
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mn>
                 3
                </mn>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 (
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 b
                </mi>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 )
                </mo>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <msqrt>
                  <mn>
                   10
                  </mn>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mi>
                   b
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   +
                  </mo>
                  <mn>
                   3
                  </mn>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    a
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mo>
                   +
                  </mo>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    b
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </msqrt>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                ]
               </mo>
              </mrow>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle C\approx \pi \left[3(a+b)-{\sqrt {(3a+b)(a+3b)}}\right]=\pi \left[3(a+b)-{\sqrt {10ab+3(a^{2}+b^{2})}}\right]}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="C\approx \pi \left[3(a+b)-{\sqrt {(3a+b)(a+3b)}}\right]=\pi \left[3(a+b)-{\sqrt {10ab+3(a^{2}+b^{2})}}\right]" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/38b3f790cb11678c0ed8bcba9d0ba2660ca42339" style="vertical-align: -1.838ex; width:75.818ex; height:5.009ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       and
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle C\approx \pi \left(a+b\right)\left(1+{\frac {3h}{10+{\sqrt {4-3h}}}}\right).}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               C
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ≈
               <!-- ≈ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 b
                </mi>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                )
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <mrow>
                   <mn>
                    3
                   </mn>
                   <mi>
                    h
                   </mi>
                  </mrow>
                  <mrow>
                   <mn>
                    10
                   </mn>
                   <mo>
                    +
                   </mo>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <msqrt>
                     <mn>
                      4
                     </mn>
                     <mo>
                      −
                      <!-- − -->
                     </mo>
                     <mn>
                      3
                     </mn>
                     <mi>
                      h
                     </mi>
                    </msqrt>
                   </mrow>
                  </mrow>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                )
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle C\approx \pi \left(a+b\right)\left(1+{\frac {3h}{10+{\sqrt {4-3h}}}}\right).}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="C\approx \pi \left(a+b\right)\left(1+{\frac {3h}{10+{\sqrt {4-3h}}}}\right)." aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/c376b0de70883bb6cb29196a1a815348b610eef9" style="vertical-align: -2.838ex; width:36.748ex; height:6.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       The errors in these approximations, which were obtained empirically, are of order
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle h^{3}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msup>
              <mi>
               h
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                3
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle h^{3}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="h^{3}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/89571cb3cd52b5c1a859ab7035c7b94e85b37149" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:2.393ex; height:2.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle h^{5},}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msup>
              <mi>
               h
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                5
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle h^{5},}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle h^{5},}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/0e8e8b4dc870b8d12b7570f46d0fb5d33b508837" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:3.04ex; height:3.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       respectively.
      </p>
      <p>
       More generally, the
       <a href="/wiki/Arc_length" title="Arc length">
        arc length
       </a>
       of a portion of the circumference, as a function of the angle subtended, is given by an incomplete
       <a href="/wiki/Elliptic_integral" title="Elliptic integral">
        elliptic integral
       </a>
       .
      </p>
      <div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">
       See also:
       <a href="/wiki/Meridian_arc#Meridian_distance_on_the_ellipsoid" title="Meridian arc">
        Meridian arc § Meridian distance on the ellipsoid
       </a>
      </div>
      <p>
       The
       <a href="/wiki/Inverse_function" title="Inverse function">
        inverse function
       </a>
       , the angle subtended as a function of the arc length, is given by the
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Elliptic_functions" title="Elliptic functions">
        elliptic functions
       </a>
       .
       <sup class="noprint Inline-Template Template-Fact" style="white-space:nowrap;">
        [
        <i>
         <a href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Citation_needed" title="Wikipedia:Citation needed">
          <span title="This claim needs references to reliable sources. (October 2010)">
           citation needed
          </span>
         </a>
        </i>
        ]
       </sup>
      </p>
      <p>
       Some lower and upper bounds on the circumference of the canonical ellipse
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle x^{2}/a^{2}+y^{2}/b^{2}=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msup>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>
               /
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mo>
               /
              </mo>
             </mrow>
             <msup>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mn>
              1
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle x^{2}/a^{2}+y^{2}/b^{2}=1}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="x^{2}/a^{2}+y^{2}/b^{2}=1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/a8b1ac4822401538fc67ffbaa99c151004316350" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:18.361ex; height:3.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       with
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a\geq b}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ≥
              <!-- ≥ -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a\geq b}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a\geq b" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ed5d3957d5f94566507526017e4ebb67c02efe81" style="vertical-align: -0.505ex; width:5.326ex; height:2.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       are
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-12">
        <a href="#cite_note-12">
         [12]
        </a>
       </sup>
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle C\leq 2\pi a,}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               C
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ≤
               <!-- ≤ -->
              </mo>
              <mn>
               2
              </mn>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle C\leq 2\pi a,}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="C\leq 2\pi a," aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/a6e938dc58d1ca05b1c97f0f04e1159fe5d2d78c" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:9.236ex; height:2.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \pi (a+b)\leq C\leq 4(a+b),}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               ≤
               <!-- ≤ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               C
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ≤
               <!-- ≤ -->
              </mo>
              <mn>
               4
              </mn>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               a
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \pi (a+b)\leq C\leq 4(a+b),}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="\pi (a+b)\leq C\leq 4(a+b)," aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/dbcd3d3ccc77b56e2153d8e2a992cd89ae1a5db7" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:24.859ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle 4{\sqrt {a^{2}+b^{2}}}\leq C\leq {\sqrt {2}}\pi {\sqrt {a^{2}+b^{2}}}.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mn>
               4
              </mn>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <msqrt>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </msqrt>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               ≤
               <!-- ≤ -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               C
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ≤
               <!-- ≤ -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <msqrt>
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </msqrt>
              </mrow>
              <mi>
               π
               <!-- π -->
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <msqrt>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </msqrt>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle 4{\sqrt {a^{2}+b^{2}}}\leq C\leq {\sqrt {2}}\pi {\sqrt {a^{2}+b^{2}}}.}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle 4{\sqrt {a^{2}+b^{2}}}\leq C\leq {\sqrt {2}}\pi {\sqrt {a^{2}+b^{2}}}.}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f4354ff41461e92274585b2867c912df52c6be2c" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:33.203ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Here the upper bound
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle 2\pi a}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mn>
              2
             </mn>
             <mi>
              π
              <!-- π -->
             </mi>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle 2\pi a}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="2\pi a" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/dcf68a5ac76f0d5a957464f181bf60d2807eda74" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:3.724ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the circumference of a
       <a href="/wiki/Circumscribed_circle" title="Circumscribed circle">
        circumscribed
       </a>
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Concentric_circle" title="Concentric circle">
        concentric circle
       </a>
       passing through the endpoints of the ellipse's major axis, and the lower bound
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle 4{\sqrt {a^{2}+b^{2}}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mn>
              4
             </mn>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <msqrt>
               <msup>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mn>
                  2
                 </mn>
                </mrow>
               </msup>
               <mo>
                +
               </mo>
               <msup>
                <mi>
                 b
                </mi>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mn>
                  2
                 </mn>
                </mrow>
               </msup>
              </msqrt>
             </mrow>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle 4{\sqrt {a^{2}+b^{2}}}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="4{\sqrt {a^{2}+b^{2}}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/e33305ba73b323001753e068840c1c1224d58638" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:10.662ex; height:3.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       is the
       <a href="/wiki/Perimeter" title="Perimeter">
        perimeter
       </a>
       of an
       <a href="/wiki/Inscribed_figure" title="Inscribed figure">
        inscribed
       </a>
       <a href="/wiki/Rhombus" title="Rhombus">
        rhombus
       </a>
       with
       <a href="/wiki/Vertex_(geometry)" title="Vertex (geometry)">
        vertices
       </a>
       at the endpoints of the major and minor axes.
      </p>
      <h3>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="Curvature">
        Curvature
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=29" title="Edit section: Curvature">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p>
       The
       <a href="/wiki/Curvature" title="Curvature">
        curvature
       </a>
       is given by
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \kappa ={\frac {1}{a^{2}b^{2}}}\left({\frac {x^{2}}{a^{4}}}+{\frac {y^{2}}{b^{4}}}\right)^{-{\frac {3}{2}}}\ ,}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              κ
              <!-- κ -->
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mfrac>
               <mn>
                1
               </mn>
               <mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mrow>
              </mfrac>
             </mrow>
             <msup>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    x
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    a
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     4
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 +
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    y
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    b
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     4
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                )
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mo>
                −
                <!-- − -->
               </mo>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mfrac>
                 <mn>
                  3
                 </mn>
                 <mn>
                  2
                 </mn>
                </mfrac>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mtext>
             </mtext>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \kappa ={\frac {1}{a^{2}b^{2}}}\left({\frac {x^{2}}{a^{4}}}+{\frac {y^{2}}{b^{4}}}\right)^{-{\frac {3}{2}}}\ ,}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle \kappa ={\frac {1}{a^{2}b^{2}}}\left({\frac {x^{2}}{a^{4}}}+{\frac {y^{2}}{b^{4}}}\right)^{-{\frac {3}{2}}}\ ,}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/d3749c0eabde6f1a53cea17700f1ac2d34207a32" style="vertical-align: -2.505ex; width:26.384ex; height:7.509ex;"/>
       </span>
       <a href="/wiki/Radius_of_curvature" title="Radius of curvature">
        radius of curvature
       </a>
       at point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x,y)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x,y)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(x,y)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/41cf50e4a314ca8e2c30964baa8d26e5be7a9386" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:5.328ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       :
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \rho =a^{2}b^{2}\left({\frac {x^{2}}{a^{4}}}+{\frac {y^{2}}{b^{4}}}\right)^{3/2}={\frac {1}{a^{4}b^{4}}}{\sqrt {\left(a^{4}y^{2}+b^{4}x^{2}\right)^{3}}}\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               ρ
               <!-- ρ -->
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                a
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                b
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <msup>
               <mrow>
                <mo>
                 (
                </mo>
                <mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mfrac>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     x
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     a
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      4
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                  </mfrac>
                 </mrow>
                 <mo>
                  +
                 </mo>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mfrac>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     y
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     b
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      4
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                  </mfrac>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
                <mo>
                 )
                </mo>
               </mrow>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 3
                </mn>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mo>
                  /
                 </mo>
                </mrow>
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mrow>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    4
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   b
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    4
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <msqrt>
                <msup>
                 <mrow>
                  <mo>
                   (
                  </mo>
                  <mrow>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     a
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      4
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     y
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <mo>
                    +
                   </mo>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     b
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      4
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                   <msup>
                    <mi>
                     x
                    </mi>
                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                     <mn>
                      2
                     </mn>
                    </mrow>
                   </msup>
                  </mrow>
                  <mo>
                   )
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   3
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </msqrt>
              </mrow>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \rho =a^{2}b^{2}\left({\frac {x^{2}}{a^{4}}}+{\frac {y^{2}}{b^{4}}}\right)^{3/2}={\frac {1}{a^{4}b^{4}}}{\sqrt {\left(a^{4}y^{2}+b^{4}x^{2}\right)^{3}}}\ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle \rho =a^{2}b^{2}\left({\frac {x^{2}}{a^{4}}}+{\frac {y^{2}}{b^{4}}}\right)^{3/2}={\frac {1}{a^{4}b^{4}}}{\sqrt {\left(a^{4}y^{2}+b^{4}x^{2}\right)^{3}}}\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/6d9b575bd02dd6021a356c5cd95bda4cf7b2acb0" style="vertical-align: -2.505ex; width:50.648ex; height:7.009ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Radius of curvature at the two
       <i>
        vertices
       </i>
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (\pm a,0)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ±
              <!-- ± -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (\pm a,0)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(\pm a,0)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/58f43d4d49576077a52ce7939e40b34e831b5fa5" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.044ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and the centers of curvature:
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \rho _{0}={\frac {b^{2}}{a}}=p\ ,\qquad \left(\pm {\frac {c^{2}}{a}}\,{\bigg |}\,0\right)\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msub>
               <mi>
                ρ
                <!-- ρ -->
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 0
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mi>
               p
              </mi>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mspace width="2em">
              </mspace>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mo>
                 ±
                 <!-- ± -->
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    c
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
                <mspace width="thinmathspace">
                </mspace>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mo maxsize="2.047em" minsize="2.047em">
                   |
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
                <mspace width="thinmathspace">
                </mspace>
                <mn>
                 0
                </mn>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                )
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \rho _{0}={\frac {b^{2}}{a}}=p\ ,\qquad \left(\pm {\frac {c^{2}}{a}}\,{\bigg |}\,0\right)\ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle \rho _{0}={\frac {b^{2}}{a}}=p\ ,\qquad \left(\pm {\frac {c^{2}}{a}}\,{\bigg |}\,0\right)\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/4557a5f894c2354243e334b2cc6bc326dc8d2fe6" style="vertical-align: -2.505ex; width:31.095ex; height:6.343ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Radius of curvature at the two
       <i>
        co-vertices
       </i>
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (0,\pm b)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mn>
