              0
             </mn>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mo>
              ±
              <!-- ± -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (0,\pm b)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="{\displaystyle (0,\pm b)}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/c4a4b6f543f2c7d7fbb812baa5306a5a9ced8c21" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:6.811ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and the centers of curvature:
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \rho _{1}={\frac {a^{2}}{b}}\ ,\qquad \left(0\,{\bigg |}\,\pm {\frac {c^{2}}{b}}\right)\ .}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msub>
               <mi>
                ρ
                <!-- ρ -->
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mi>
                 b
                </mi>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               ,
              </mo>
              <mspace width="2em">
              </mspace>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mn>
                 0
                </mn>
                <mspace width="thinmathspace">
                </mspace>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mo maxsize="2.047em" minsize="2.047em">
                   |
                  </mo>
                 </mrow>
                </mrow>
                <mspace width="thinmathspace">
                </mspace>
                <mo>
                 ±
                 <!-- ± -->
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    c
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mi>
                   b
                  </mi>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>

               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \rho _{1}={\frac {a^{2}}{b}}\ ,\qquad \left(0\,{\bigg |}\,\pm {\frac {c^{2}}{b}}\right)\ .}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\displaystyle \rho _{1}={\frac {a^{2}}{b}}\ ,\qquad \left(0\,{\bigg |}\,\pm {\frac {c^{2}}{b}}\right)\ .}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/e1b5ed0360c73ff3a5ad02af4bdbf7c46490b6de" style="vertical-align: -2.505ex; width:28.091ex; height:6.343ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <h2>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="Ellipse_as_quadric">
        Ellipse as quadric
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=30" title="Edit section: Ellipse as quadric">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h2>
      <h3>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="General_ellipse">
        General ellipse
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=31" title="Edit section: General ellipse">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p>
       In
       <a href="/wiki/Analytic_geometry" title="Analytic geometry">
        analytic geometry
       </a>
       , the ellipse is defined as a quadric: the set of points
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (X,Y)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              X
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              Y
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (X,Y)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(X,Y)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/41f29b9537685f499713112d6802e811cbf51bba" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:6.597ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       of the
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Cartesian_plane" title="Cartesian plane">
        Cartesian plane
       </a>
       that, in non-degenerate cases, satisfy the
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Implicit_and_explicit_functions" title="Implicit and explicit functions">
        implicit
       </a>
       equation
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-13">
        <a href="#cite_note-13">
         [13]
        </a>
       </sup>
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-14">
        <a href="#cite_note-14">
         [14]
        </a>
       </sup>
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle ~AX^{2}+BXY+CY^{2}+DX+EY+F=0}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mtext>
              </mtext>
              <mi>
               A
              </mi>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                X
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               B
              </mi>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               C
              </mi>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                Y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               D
              </mi>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               E
              </mi>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               0
              </mn>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle ~AX^{2}+BXY+CY^{2}+DX+EY+F=0}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="~AX^{2}+BXY+CY^{2}+DX+EY+F=0" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/247790f0c205648af4157a82fe883b027a3fd950" style="vertical-align: -0.505ex; width:43.27ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       provided
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle B^{2}-4AC&lt;0.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msup>
              <mi>
               B
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <mn>
              4
             </mn>
             <mi>
              A
             </mi>
             <mi>
              C
             </mi>
             <mo>
              &lt;
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0.
             </mn>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle B^{2}-4AC&lt;0.}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="B^{2}-4AC&lt;0." aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/4f9b3184559e82578c79d0efc54045fd4982c5d5" style="vertical-align: -0.505ex; width:15.238ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
      </p>
      <p>
       To distinguish the
       <a href="/wiki/Degenerate_conic" title="Degenerate conic">
        degenerate cases
       </a>
       from the non-degenerate case, let
       <i>
        ∆
       </i>
       be the
       <a href="/wiki/Determinant" title="Determinant">
        determinant
       </a>
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\begin{vmatrix}A&amp;B/2&amp;D/2\\B/2&amp;C&amp;E/2\\D/2&amp;E/2&amp;F\end{vmatrix}};}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mrow>
                <mo>
                 |
                </mo>
                <mtable columnspacing="1em" rowspacing="4pt">
                 <mtr>
                  <mtd>
                   <mi>
                    A
                   </mi>
                  </mtd>
                  <mtd>
                   <mi>
                    B
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo>
                     /
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mtd>
                  <mtd>
                   <mi>
                    D
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo>
                     /
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mtd>
                 </mtr>
                 <mtr>
                  <mtd>
                   <mi>
                    B
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo>
                     /
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mtd>
                  <mtd>
                   <mi>
                    C
                   </mi>
                  </mtd>
                  <mtd>
                   <mi>
                    E
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo>
                     /
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mtd>
                 </mtr>
                 <mtr>
                  <mtd>
                   <mi>
                    D
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo>
                     /
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mtd>
                  <mtd>
                   <mi>
                    E
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mo>
                     /
                    </mo>
                   </mrow>
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mtd>
                  <mtd>
                   <mi>
                    F
                   </mi>
                  </mtd>
                 </mtr>
                </mtable>
                <mo>
                 |
                </mo>
               </mrow>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               ;
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\begin{vmatrix}A&amp;B/2&amp;D/2\\B/2&amp;C&amp;E/2\\D/2&amp;E/2&amp;F\end{vmatrix}};}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\begin{vmatrix}A&amp;B/2&amp;D/2\\B/2&amp;C&amp;E/2\\D/2&amp;E/2&amp;F\end{vmatrix}};" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ae5bcd9e9589779b7e36065b7c1c041c2c0055f6" style="vertical-align: -4.338ex; width:19.936ex; height:9.843ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       that is,
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle \Delta =\left(AC-{\frac {B^{2}}{4}}\right)F+{\frac {BED}{4}}-{\frac {CD^{2}}{4}}-{\frac {AE^{2}}{4}}.}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi mathvariant="normal">
               Δ
               <!-- Δ -->
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mrow>
               <mo>
                (
               </mo>
               <mrow>
                <mi>
                 A
                </mi>
                <mi>
                 C
                </mi>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mfrac>
                  <msup>
                   <mi>
                    B
                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>
                     2
                    </mn>
                   </mrow>
                  </msup>
                  <mn>
                   4
                  </mn>
                 </mfrac>
                </mrow>
               </mrow>
               <mo>
                )
               </mo>
              </mrow>
              <mi>
               F
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>
                  B
                 </mi>
                 <mi>
                  E
                 </mi>
                 <mi>
                  D
                 </mi>
                </mrow>
                <mn>
                 4
                </mn>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>
                  C
                 </mi>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   D
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
                <mn>
                 4
                </mn>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mi>
                  A
                 </mi>
                 <msup>
                  <mi>
                   E
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
                <mn>
                 4
                </mn>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               .
              </mo>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle \Delta =\left(AC-{\frac {B^{2}}{4}}\right)F+{\frac {BED}{4}}-{\frac {CD^{2}}{4}}-{\frac {AE^{2}}{4}}.}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="\Delta =\left(AC-{\frac {B^{2}}{4}}\right)F+{\frac {BED}{4}}-{\frac {CD^{2}}{4}}-{\frac {AE^{2}}{4}}." aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/3d79dd1bd03acb1b2542a1b24ef0ff4be50abad1" style="vertical-align: -2.505ex; width:47.064ex; height:6.343ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Then the ellipse is a non-degenerate real ellipse if and only if
       <i>
        C∆
       </i>
       &lt; 0. If
       <i>
        C∆
       </i>
       &gt; 0, we have an imaginary ellipse, and if
       <i>
        ∆
       </i>
       = 0, we have a point ellipse.
       <sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-Lawrence_15-0">
        <a href="#cite_note-Lawrence-15">
         [15]
        </a>
       </sup>
       <sup class="reference" style="white-space:nowrap;">
        :
        <span>
         p.63
        </span>
       </sup>
      </p>
      <p>
       The general equation's coefficients can be obtained from known semi-major axis
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/ffd2487510aa438433a2579450ab2b3d557e5edc" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.23ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       , semi-minor axis
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle b}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle b}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="b" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f11423fbb2e967f986e36804a8ae4271734917c3" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:0.998ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       , center coordinates
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x_{c},y_{c})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x_{c},y_{c})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(x_{c},y_{c})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/16480a7cb48365325f8ebc21f15ee26287f11eea" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:7.201ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and rotation angle
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \Theta }" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi mathvariant="normal">
              Θ
              <!-- Θ -->
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \Theta }
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="\Theta " aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/bc927b19f46d005b4720db7a0f96cd5b6f1a0d9b" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.808ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       using the following formulae:
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">

             {\displaystyle {\begin{aligned}A&amp;=a^{2}(\sin \Theta )^{2}+b^{2}(\cos \Theta )^{2}\\B&amp;=2(b^{2}-a^{2})\sin \Theta \cos \Theta \\C&amp;=a^{2}(\cos \Theta )^{2}+b^{2}(\sin \Theta )^{2}\\D&amp;=-2Ax_{c}-By_{c}\\E&amp;=-Bx_{c}-2Cy_{c}\\F&amp;=Ax_{c}^{2}+Bx_{c}y_{c}+Cy_{c}^{2}-a^{2}b^{2}\end{aligned}}}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\begin{aligned}A&amp;=a^{2}(\sin \Theta )^{2}+b^{2}(\cos \Theta )^{2}\\B&amp;=2(b^{2}-a^{2})\sin \Theta \cos \Theta \\C&amp;=a^{2}(\cos \Theta )^{2}+b^{2}(\sin \Theta )^{2}\\D&amp;=-2Ax_{c}-By_{c}\\E&amp;=-Bx_{c}-2Cy_{c}\\F&amp;=Ax_{c}^{2}+Bx_{c}y_{c}+Cy_{c}^{2}-a^{2}b^{2}\end{aligned}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/897ca74e0663ce17400c838931bb9b1f90980d93" style="vertical-align: -9.005ex; width:32.861ex; height:19.176ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       These expressions can be derived from the canonical equation (see next section) by substituting the coordinates with expressions for rotation and translation of the coordinate system:
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\frac {x_{can}^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {y_{can}^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <msubsup>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mi>
                   c
                  </mi>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mi>
                   n
                  </mi>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msubsup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <msubsup>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mi>
                   c
                  </mi>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mi>
                   n
                  </mi>
                 </mrow>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msubsup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\frac {x_{can}^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {y_{can}^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\frac {x_{can}^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {y_{can}^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/464fdbd3169f2aec89ab2693d820ae891f9f1682" style="vertical-align: -2.171ex; width:16.843ex; height:6.009ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle x_{can}=(x-x_{c})\cos \Theta +(y-y_{c})\sin \Theta }" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msub>
               <mi>
                x
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mi>
                 c
                </mi>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
                <mi>
                 n
                </mi>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                x
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mi>
                 c
                </mi>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mi>
               cos
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi mathvariant="normal">
               Θ
               <!-- Θ -->
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mi>
                 c
                </mi>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi mathvariant="normal">
               Θ
               <!-- Θ -->
              </mi>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle x_{can}=(x-x_{c})\cos \Theta +(y-y_{c})\sin \Theta }
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="x_{can}=(x-x_{c})\cos \Theta +(y-y_{c})\sin \Theta " aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/9e1144ed5b0e0f714ab30584eadca72dd799f577" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:37.342ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle y_{can}=-(x-x_{c})\sin \Theta +(y-y_{c})\cos \Theta }" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msub>
               <mi>
                y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mi>
                 c
                </mi>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
                <mi>
                 n
                </mi>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               x
              </mi>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                x
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mi>
                 c
                </mi>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mi>
               sin
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi mathvariant="normal">
               Θ
               <!-- Θ -->
              </mi>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               (
              </mo>
              <mi>
               y
              </mi>
              <mo>
               −
               <!-- − -->
              </mo>
              <msub>
               <mi>
                y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mi>
                 c
                </mi>
               </mrow>
              </msub>
              <mo stretchy="false">
               )
              </mo>
              <mi>
               cos
              </mi>
              <mo>
               ⁡
               <!-- ⁡ -->
              </mo>
              <mi mathvariant="normal">
               Θ
               <!-- Θ -->
              </mi>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle y_{can}=-(x-x_{c})\sin \Theta +(y-y_{c})\cos \Theta }
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="y_{can}=-(x-x_{c})\sin \Theta +(y-y_{c})\cos \Theta " aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/6c4ed67b50ff60ae319ee2e8291a7c823da7d26a" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:38.96ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <h3>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="Canonical_form">
        Canonical form
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Ellipse&amp;action=edit&amp;section=32" title="Edit section: Canonical form">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h3>
      <p>
       Let
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a&gt;b}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              &gt;
             </mo>
             <mi>
              b
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a&gt;b}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a&gt;b" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/83fc0063781fb9bf4ec7608b2fd11ed6d5b05a13" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:5.326ex; height:2.176ex;"/>
       </span>
       . Through change of coordinates (a
       <a href="/wiki/Rotation_of_axes" title="Rotation of axes">
        rotation of axes
       </a>
       and a
       <a href="/wiki/Translation_of_axes" title="Translation of axes">
        translation of axes
       </a>
       ) the general ellipse can be described by the
       <a href="/wiki/Canonical_form" title="Canonical form">
        canonical implicit equation
       </a>
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\frac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\frac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\frac {x^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {y^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/3d7eb067b1ac196e718e5003ed60a0ea37577483" style="vertical-align: -2.171ex; width:13.372ex; height:6.009ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Here
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (x,y)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (x,y)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(x,y)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/41cf50e4a314ca8e2c30964baa8d26e5be7a9386" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:5.328ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       are the point coordinates in the canonical system, whose origin is the center
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (X_{c},Y_{c})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (X_{c},Y_{c})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(X_{c},Y_{c})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/eca10c1c1f2ba32915479f337d404fd454c89767" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:8.006ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       of the ellipse, whose
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle x}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle x}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="x" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/87f9e315fd7e2ba406057a97300593c4802b53e4" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:1.33ex; height:1.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       -axis is the unit vector
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (X_{a},Y_{a})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                a
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                a
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (X_{a},Y_{a})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(X_{a},Y_{a})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/75317f624130795b54cafd18afadc9d9cd6e7b2c" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:8.322ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       coinciding with the major axis, and whose
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle y}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle y}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="y" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/b8a6208ec717213d4317e666f1ae872e00620a0d" style="vertical-align: -0.671ex; width:1.155ex; height:2.009ex;"/>
       </span>
       -axis is the perpendicular vector
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (-Y_{a},X_{a})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                a
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                a
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (-Y_{a},X_{a})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(-Y_{a},X_{a})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/8adda80cc1456daaec0e9c43a494a0929c19889a" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:10.13ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       coinciding with the minor axis. That is,
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle x=X_{a}(X-X_{c})+Y_{a}(Y-Y_{c})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              x
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                a
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              X
             </mi>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                a
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              Y
             </mi>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle x=X_{a}(X-X_{c})+Y_{a}(Y-Y_{c})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="x=X_{a}(X-X_{c})+Y_{a}(Y-Y_{c})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/37676c31dc61ef200706fc6abcb635c3a9c9e19e" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:30.963ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle y=-Y_{a}(X-X_{c})+X_{a}(Y-Y_{c})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              y
             </mi>
             <mo>
              =
             </mo>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                a
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              X
             </mi>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                a
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              Y
             </mi>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle y=-Y_{a}(X-X_{c})+X_{a}(Y-Y_{c})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="y=-Y_{a}(X-X_{c})+X_{a}(Y-Y_{c})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/145742826ccd8798be39edf9830d15d6e338ad70" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:32.597ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       .
      </p>
      <p>
       In this system, the center is the origin
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (0,0)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (0,0)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(0,0)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/5d630d3e781a53b0a3559ae7e5b45f9479a3141a" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:5.168ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and the foci are
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (-ea,0)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (-ea,0)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(-ea,0)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/eb2d1947642c9f03ceb5c215af795af9d2790d8d" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:8.127ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (+ea,0)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mn>
              0
             </mn>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (+ea,0)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(+ea,0)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/600bfa2fd0d4668818632e3c5e86c9d57c02d619" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:8.127ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       .
      </p>
      <p>
       Any ellipse can be obtained by
       <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Rotation_(geometry)" title="Rotation (geometry)">
        rotation
       </a>
       and
       <a href="/wiki/Translation_(geometry)" title="Translation (geometry)">
        translation
       </a>
       of a canonical ellipse with the proper semi-diameters. The expression of an ellipse centered at
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (X_{c},Y_{c})}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               X
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <msub>
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi>
                c
               </mi>
              </mrow>
             </msub>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (X_{c},Y_{c})}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(X_{c},Y_{c})" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/eca10c1c1f2ba32915479f337d404fd454c89767" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:8.006ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       is
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\frac {(x-X_{c})^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {(y-Y_{c})^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  (
                 </mo>
                 <mi>
                  x
                 </mi>
                 <mo>
                  −
                  <!-- − -->
                 </mo>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   X
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mi>
                    c
                   </mi>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                 <msup>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mfrac>
                <mrow>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  (
                 </mo>
                 <mi>
                  y
                 </mi>
                 <mo>
                  −
                  <!-- − -->
                 </mo>
                 <msub>
                  <mi>
                   Y
                  </mi>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mi>
                    c
                   </mi>
                  </mrow>
                 </msub>
                 <msup>
                  <mo stretchy="false">
                   )
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mn>
                    2
                   </mn>
                  </mrow>
                 </msup>
                </mrow>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  b
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </mfrac>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle {\frac {(x-X_{c})^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {(y-Y_{c})^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="{\frac {(x-X_{c})^{2}}{a^{2}}}+{\frac {(y-Y_{c})^{2}}{b^{2}}}=1" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/e8f040758c88ac7bc0d75664d5b0dc1537c2c07e" style="vertical-align: -2.171ex; width:27.83ex; height:6.176ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       Moreover, any canonical ellipse can be obtained by scaling the
       <a href="/wiki/Unit_circle" title="Unit circle">
        unit circle
       </a>
       of
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle \mathbb {R} ^{2}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <msup>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mi mathvariant="double-struck">
                R
               </mi>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mn>
                2
               </mn>
              </mrow>
             </msup>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle \mathbb {R} ^{2}}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="\mathbb {R} ^{2}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/e150115ab9f63023215109595b76686a1ff890fd" style="vertical-align: -0.338ex; width:2.732ex; height:2.676ex;"/>
       </span>
       , defined by the equation
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle X^{2}+Y^{2}=1\,}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <msup>
               <mi>
                X
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               +
              </mo>
              <msup>
               <mi>
                Y
               </mi>
               <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <mn>
                 2
                </mn>
               </mrow>
              </msup>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mn>
               1
              </mn>
              <mspace width="thinmathspace">
              </mspace>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle X^{2}+Y^{2}=1\,}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="X^{2}+Y^{2}=1\," aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/f5edc62db0e86f38646f9237929ea1ff4674d2c4" style="vertical-align: -0.505ex; width:13.494ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       by factors
       <i>
        a
       </i>
       and
       <i>
        b
       </i>
       along the two axes.
      </p>
      <p>
       For an ellipse in canonical form, we have
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle Y=\pm b{\sqrt {1-(X/a)^{2}}}=\pm {\sqrt {(a^{2}-X^{2})(1-e^{2})}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mi>
               Y
              </mi>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo>
               ±
               <!-- ± -->
              </mo>
              <mi>
               b
              </mi>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <msqrt>
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 (
                </mo>
                <mi>
                 X
                </mi>
                <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                 <mo>
                  /
                 </mo>
                </mrow>
                <mi>
                 a
                </mi>
                <msup>
                 <mo stretchy="false">
                  )
                 </mo>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
               </msqrt>
              </mrow>
              <mo>
               =
              </mo>
              <mo>
               ±
               <!-- ± -->
              </mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <msqrt>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 (
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  a
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  X
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 )
                </mo>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 (
                </mo>
                <mn>
                 1
                </mn>
                <mo>
                 −
                 <!-- − -->
                </mo>
                <msup>
                 <mi>
                  e
                 </mi>
                 <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                  <mn>
                   2
                  </mn>
                 </mrow>
                </msup>
                <mo stretchy="false">
                 )
                </mo>
               </msqrt>
              </mrow>
             </mstyle>
            </mrow>
            <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
             {\displaystyle Y=\pm b{\sqrt {1-(X/a)^{2}}}=\pm {\sqrt {(a^{2}-X^{2})(1-e^{2})}}}
            </annotation>
           </semantics>
          </math>
         </span>
         <img alt="Y=\pm b{\sqrt {1-(X/a)^{2}}}=\pm {\sqrt {(a^{2}-X^{2})(1-e^{2})}}" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/060c63e3c917fef868ab19480e97eeec0c5d3ac9" style="vertical-align: -1.671ex; width:46.405ex; height:4.843ex;"/>
        </span>
       </dd>
      </dl>
      <p>
       The distances from a point
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle (X,Y)}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mo stretchy="false">
              (
             </mo>
             <mi>
              X
             </mi>
             <mo>
              ,
             </mo>
             <mi>
              Y
             </mi>
             <mo stretchy="false">
              )
             </mo>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle (X,Y)}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="(X,Y)" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/41f29b9537685f499713112d6802e811cbf51bba" style="vertical-align: -0.838ex; width:6.597ex; height:2.843ex;"/>
       </span>
       on the ellipse to the left and right foci are
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a+eX}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              +
             </mo>
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mi>
              X
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a+eX}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a+eX" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/53545739015d4c44385ab3fe4dba477e7e271a12" style="vertical-align: -0.505ex; width:7.134ex; height:2.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       and
       <span class="mwe-math-element">
        <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
         <math alttext="{\displaystyle a-eX}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
          <semantics>
           <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
             <mi>
              a
             </mi>
             <mo>
              −
              <!-- − -->
             </mo>
             <mi>
              e
             </mi>
             <mi>
              X
             </mi>
            </mstyle>
           </mrow>
           <annotation encoding="application/x-tex">
            {\displaystyle a-eX}
           </annotation>
          </semantics>
         </math>
        </span>
        <img alt="a-eX" aria-hidden="true" class="mwe-math-fallback-image-inline" src="https://wikimedia.org/api/rest_v1/media/math/render/svg/1b976be12ec627c6420733e66c9d2feba9a25dc9" style="vertical-align: -0.505ex; width:7.134ex; height:2.343ex;"/>
       </span>
       , respectively.
      </p>
      <p>
       The canonical form coefficients can be obtained from the general form coefficients using the following equations:
      </p>
      <dl>
       <dd>
        <span class="mwe-math-element">
         <span class="mwe-math-mathml-inline mwe-math-mathml-a11y" style="display: none;">
          <math alttext="{\displaystyle {\begin{aligned}a,b&amp;={\frac {-{\sqrt {2{\Big (}AE^{2}+CD^{2}-BDE+(B^{2}-4AC)F{\Big )}\left(A+C\pm {\sqrt {(A-C)^{2}+B^{2}}}\right)}}}{B^{2}-4AC}}\\X_{c}&amp;={\frac {2CD-BE}{B^{2}-4AC}}\\Y_{c}&amp;={\frac {2AE-BD}{B^{2}-4AC}}\\\Theta &amp;={\begin{cases}0&amp;{\text{for }}B=0,A&lt;C\\90^{\circ }&amp;{\text{for }}B=0,A&gt;C\\\arctan {\frac {C-A-{\sqrt {(A-C)^{2}+B^{2}}}}{B}}&amp;{\text{for }}B\neq 0\end{cases}}\end{aligned}}}" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
           <semantics>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
             <mstyle displaystyle="true" scriptlevel="0">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
               <mtable columnalign="right left right left right left right left right left right left" columnspacing="0em 2em 0em 2em 0em 2em 0em 2em 0em 2em 0em" displaystyle="true" rowspacing="3pt">
                <mtr>
                 <mtd>
                  <mi>
                   a
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   ,
                  </mo>
                  <mi>
                   b
                  </mi>
                 </mtd>
                 <mtd>
                  <mi>
                  </mi>
                  <mo>
                   =
                  </mo>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                   <mfrac>
                    <mrow>
                     <mo>
                      −
                      <!-- − -->
                     </mo>
                     <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                      <msqrt>
                       <mn>
                        2
                       </mn>
                       <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                         <mo maxsize="1.623em" minsize="1.623em">
                          (
                         </mo>
                        </mrow>
                       </mrow>
                       <mi>
                        A
                       </mi>
                       <msup>
                        <mi>
                         E
                        </mi>
                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                         <mn>
                          2
                         </mn>
                        </mrow>
                       </msup>
                       <mo>
                        +
                       </mo>
                       <mi>

                       </mi>
                       <msup>
                        <mi>

                        </mi>
                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                         <mn>
                          2
                         </mn>
                        </mrow>
                       </msup>
                       <mo>
                        −
                        <!-- − -->
                       </mo>
                       <mi>
                        B
                       </mi>
                       <mi>
                        D
                       </mi>
                       <mi>

                       </mi>
                       <mo>
                        +
                       </mo>
                       <mo stretchy="false">
                        (
                       </mo>
                       <msup>
                        <mi>
                         B
                        </mi>
                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                         <mn>
                          2
                         </mn>
                        </mrow>
                       </msup>
                       <mo>
                        −
                        <!-- − -->
                       </mo>
                       <mn>
                        4
                       </mn>
                       <mi>
                        A
                       </mi>
                       <mi>
                        C
                       </mi>
                       <mo stretchy="false">
                        )
                       </mo>
                       <mi>
                        F
                       </mi>
                       <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                         <mo maxsize="1.623em" minsize="1.623em">
                          )
                         </mo>
                        </mrow>
                       </mrow>
                       <mrow>
                        <mo>
                         (
                        </mo>
                        <mrow>
                         <mi>
                          A
                         </mi>
                         <mo>
                          +
                         </mo>
                         <mi>
                          C
                         </mi>
                         <mo>
                          ±
                          <!-- ± -->
                         </mo>
                         <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                          <msqrt>
                           <mo stretchy="false">
                            (
                           </mo>
                           <mi>
                            A
                           </mi>
                           <mo>
                            −
                            <!-- − -->
                           </mo>
                           <mi>

                        </mo>
                       </mrow>
                      </msqrt>
                     </mrow>
                    </mrow>
                    <mrow>
                     <msup>
                      <mi>

                      </mi>
                      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

                      </mrow>

                     </mo>

                     </mn>
                     <mi>

                     <mi>

                     </mi>
                    </mrow>
                   </mfrac>
                  </mrow>
                 </mtd>
                </mtr>
                <mtr>
                 <mtd>
                  <msub>
                   <mi>

                   </mi>
                   <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mi>

                    </mi>
                   </mrow>
                  </msub>
                 </mtd>
                 <mtd>
                  <mi>

                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">

                     </mo>

                     <msup>
                      <mi>

                      </mi>

                       </mn>
                      </mrow>
                     </msup>
                     <mo>

                      <!-- − -->
                     </mo>

                     </mn>
                     <mi>

                     </mi>
                     <mi>
